Public Class UIElement Inherits Visual Implements IAnimatable, IInputElement
public ref class UIElement : System::Windows::Media::Visual, System::Windows::IInputElement, System::Windows::Media::Animation::IAnimatable

summary.span: 是以 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 項目和基本呈現方式特性為建置基礎之 WPF 核心層級實作的基底類別。

span.span: is a base class for WPF core level implementations building on Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements and basic presentation characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供項目配置的特性，以及公開虛擬衍生類別的方法可以覆寫時，可能會影響轉譯行為的項目和其子項目配置的起始點。 provides a starting point for element layout characteristics, and also exposes virtual methods that derived classes can override, which can influence the layout rendering behavior of the element and its child elements. 大部分的輸入和焦點行為項目的一般情況下也會定義在類別。Much of the input and focusing behavior for elements in general is also defined in the class. 這包括鍵盤、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入及相關的狀態屬性的事件。This includes the events for keyboard, mouse and stylus input, and related status properties. 其中許多事件會路由的事件，以及許多輸入相關的事件都有兩個反昇路由版本，以及通道事件的版本。Many of these events are routed events, and many of the input-related events have both a bubbling routing version as well as a tunneling version of the event. 這些配對的事件通常是最大控制項作者感興趣的事件。These paired events are typically the events of greatest interest to control authors. 也包含[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]相關的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]事件模型，包括可以引發的方法所指定路由傳送來自於項目執行個體的事件。 also includes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] that relate to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] event model, including methods that can raise specified routed events that are sourced from an element instance. 就架構而言，可以視為約略相當於視窗控制代碼，以[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)]程式設計中或中的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)]程式設計。In terms of architecture, can be considered roughly equivalent to a window handle in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_win32](~/includes/tlasharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, or an Element in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dhtml](~/includes/tlasharptla-dhtml-md.md)] programming. 是基底的項目，在 WPF 核心層級。 is a base element at the WPF core level. A具有下列功能，特別由定義類別：A has the following capabilities that are specifically defined by the class: - 可以轉譯為子元素 (衍生自，高的層級圖形類別)Can render as a child element ( derives from , a high level graphics class) - 包含用於大小和位置可能子項目數的邏輯（當解譯版面配置系統）Contains logic that is used to size and position possible child elements of a (when interpreted by a layout system) - 可以回應使用者輸入 （包括控制項的位置輸入傳送至事件路由傳送，或將命令路由，其處理透過）Can respond to user input (including control of where input is getting sent to via their handling of event routing, or routing of commands) - 可以提高路由的事件的路由邏輯項目樹狀結構Can raise routed events that travel a route through the logical element tree - 支援動畫系統的某些層面，Supports some aspects of the animation system 是為基礎的 WPF 架構層級實作類別，並將特定的 WPF 架構層級互動。 is the WPF framework-level implementation class that builds on , and adds specific interactions with the WPF framework level. 新增並定義下列功能： adds and defines the following capabilities: - 其他架構特定配置的特性Additional framework-specific layout characteristics - 報告內容的中繼資料更豐富的支援Support for richer metadata reporting on properties - 輸入基底類別和其附加的屬性的特定類別的特定實作，或附加事件Class-specific implementation of certain input base classes and their attached properties or attached events - 樣式支援Style support - 進一步的動畫支援Further animation support 另一個相關的類別是。Another related class is . 類別會實作許多相同的成員沒有; 並使用其預期將放在整體內容模型中對這兩個類別之間的差異。The class implements many of the same members as does ; the difference between these two classes has to do with their intended place in the overall content model. A通常會在衍生的類別定義相對固定的內容模型，這表示有一些限制哪些項目可能會在標記中的子項目。A derived class typically defines a relatively rigid content model, meaning that there are restrictions on what elements may be child elements in markup. 可能會花費較不嚴格的子內容的容量，但該容量通常會集中在指定的內容屬性中。There might be capacity for taking less restrictive child content in a , but that capacity is typically centralized in designated content properties. A衍生的類別通常不是內容，以支援的案例，例如流程格式的文件相關的嚴格。A derived class is typically not as restrictive about content, to support scenarios such as flow-format documents. > [!IMPORTANT] > 狀態會影響所有的項目所處理的輸入。 state affects all input handling by that element. 不會顯示的項目不會參與點擊測試，而不會收到輸入的事件，即使滑鼠經過範圍將項目如果可以看見。Elements that are not visible do not participate in hit testing and do not receive input events, even if the mouse is over the bounds where the element would be if were visible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立的新執行個體實際上是型別是應用程式程式碼中不常發生因為是基底的項目。Creating a new instance that is actually of type is uncommon in application code, because is a base element. 請參閱[基底項目概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md)。See [Base Elements Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/base-elements-overview.md).

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event.

param.span: 表示註冊處理常式，以便即使路由事件在其事件資料中標記為已處理，仍會叫用該處理常式。 表示以預設條件註冊處理常式，也就是如果路由事件已經標記為已處理，則不會叫用該處理常式。

span.span: to register the handler such that it is invoked even when the routed event is marked handled in its event data; to register the handler with the default condition that it will not be invoked if the routed event is already marked handled.
The default is .

span.span: Do not routinely ask to rehandle a routed event.

summary.span: 加入所指定路由事件的路由事件處理常式，會將此處理常式加入目前項目的處理常式集合中。

span.span: Adds a routed event handler for a specified routed event, adding the handler to the handler collection on the current element.

summary.span: 將 指定為 ，以針對已經由事件路由上另一個項目標記為已處理的路由事件，叫用提供的處理常式。

span.span: Specify as to have the provided handler be invoked for routed event that had already been marked as handled by another element along the event route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可行的方式處理低階輸入是一個複雜的工作。Processing low-level input events in a practical way is a complex task. 許多控制項實作特定事件標示為已處理，而取代為另一個更具直覺性事件的行為。Many controls implement behavior where a certain event is marked as handled, and is replaced by another more intuitive event. 一般而言，控制項只會將平台輸入的事件，為已處理，如果沒有這麼做一些設計用意。Generally, a control will only mark a platform input event as handled if there is some design intention for doing so. 在某些情況下，這些設計目的不可能的輸入事件的特定處理的需要。In certain scenarios, those design intentions might not be what your particular handling of the input event requires. 這些案例是該註冊處理常式取代`handledEventsToo`為`true`適合。It is for these scenarios that registering handlers with `handledEventsToo` as `true` is appropriate. 但您不應該這麼例行性。But you should not do this routinely. 叫用處理常式以回應所有事件，即使處理將會使得您自己的應用程式事件處理邏輯。Invoking handlers in response to all events even if handled will complicate your own application event processing logic. 如果處理常式邏輯的很大，可能會看到效能降低。You may see a decrease in performance if the handler logic is substantial. 您應該保留附加尚未處理的情況下，您已經發現特定控制項所處理的事件，您仍然想要處理的應用程式邏輯在開發程序的事件處理常式的使用。You should reserve the use of attaching handlers for already-handled events for situations where you have already discovered during the development process that certain controls are handling events that you still want to handle with application logic. 避免處理行為的某些事件控制組合類別的另一個技術是使用該事件預覽替代方案。Another technique for avoiding the class handling behavior of certain event-control combinations is to use that event's preview alternative. 例如，如果標示為已處理的類別處理，您可以加入處理常式改為。For example, if is marked handled by class handling, you might be able to add handlers for instead. 您可以加入相同的處理常式事件多次，而不會引發例外狀況。You can add the same handler for the same event multiple times without raising an exception. 不過，此處理常式實際叫用時處理事件的多次。However, the handler is actually invoked multiple times when the event is handled. 因此，請考慮如何這種行為可能會有副作用，都應該在處理常式實作。Therefore, consider how this behavior might have side effects that should be accounted for in your handler implementation. 您通常使用這個方法來提供的 「 加入 」 存取子的實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]事件的自訂路由事件的存取模式。You typically use this method to provide the implementation of the "add" accessor for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] event access pattern of a custom routed event. ## Examples 下列範例會實作上叫用的處理常式將定義的處理常式附加至其中一個具名的項目頁面使用頁面上的事件`handledEventsToo` `true`。The following example implements a handler invoked on the event on a page that attaches a defined handler to one of the named elements on the page using `handledEventsToo` `true`. 會叫用這個處理常式，即使此路由上的另一個項目標示為已處理到達路由處理項目之前共用的事件資料。This handler would be invoked even if another element along the route marked the shared event data as handled before reaching the handling element in the route. [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#addhandlerhandledtoo)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#AddHandlerHandledToo](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#addhandlerhandledtoo)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容主機項目可以使用這個方法 (可能是指實作或未) 若要加入的子項目，來處理常式。This method can be used by content host elements (either those that implement or those that don't) to add handlers for child elements to the . 通常，這是不必要的，因為處理常式會自動新增為已完成的邏輯樹狀結構中找到的所有項目。Ordinarily, this is not required for , because handlers are automatically added for all elements found in a completed logical tree. 不過，在某些情況下其中和樣板化的樹狀結構中, 介來自要新增到路由範本需要的項目中混用。However, in some cases where and are mixed in templated trees, intervening elements that came from the template need to be added to a route. 同時和支援這個方法的版本。Both and support a version of this method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AllowDrop { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定此元素是否可以當做拖放操作目標的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果這個項目可以用來做為拖放作業的目標則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if this element can be used as the target of a drag-and-drop operation; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業依預設，未啟用，且必須藉由設定刻意啟用至`true`。Drag-and-drop operations are not enabled by default, and must be enabled deliberately by setting to `true`. 超出此基本設定，拖放行為完全實作特定，不由定義或其他類型的基底項目類別。Beyond this basic setting, drag-and-drop behavior is entirely implementation specific and is not defined by or any other base element class. 某些控制項，例如，沒有預設行為。Certain controls, for example, , do have a default behavior. 如需拖放的詳細資訊，請參閱[拖曳和卸除概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md)。For more information on drag and drop, see [Drag and Drop Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/drag-and-drop-overview.md). 覆寫這個實作中的相依性屬性的中繼資料。 overrides the metadata for this dependency property in its implementation. 具體來說，指定這個屬性可讓屬性值繼承 (是`true`中繼資料中)。Specifically, designates this property to allow property value inheritance ( is `true` in metadata). 在此內容中的屬性值繼承表示，如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素指派透過本機值或最接近的父元素的值指派 （同樣地，有兩種預設的樣式，此值與樣式值或為區域數值），然後從父元素的值會指派給所有先前未指派的子元素屬性系統。Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a local value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all previously unassigned child elements by the property system. 實際上這表示您可以指定是否要在根項目，允許卸除作業，並將它做為值將會傳播到所有其子項目具有未特別指派`false`。In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow drop operations at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列標記範例會設定屬性`true`上使用屬性，以及一些其他設定相關的屬性，以彙總，讓為目標的多行文字資料物件時拖曳。The following markup example sets the property `true` using an attribute on a , as well as setting some other related properties that in aggregate enable that to be the target of a multiline text data object when it is dragged in. 如需完整範例，請參閱[載入卸除檔案範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7)。For the complete sample, see [Load a Dropped File Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be90d645-dd61-4f53-93bb-87902d086ef7). [!code-xaml[DragDrop_DropOpenTextFile#UIElementAllowDrop](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DropOpenTextFile/CS/window1.xaml#uielementallowdrop)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要移除屬性的動畫，指定做為該屬性的識別項`dp`並指定`clock`為`null`。To remove an animation from a property, specify the identifier for that property as `dp` and specify `clock` as `null`. 這會移除動畫和動畫的屬性設定為其基底值。This removes the animation and the animated property is set to its base value. 不過，並不會停止原先相關聯的動畫時鐘。However, the originally associated animation clock is not stopped. 指派給該時鐘的其他任何動畫會繼續執行。Any other animations assigned to that clock will continue to run. ## Examples 在下列範例中， `myAnimatedRectangle`有特定的計時動畫套用至它，藉由呼叫。In the following example, a `myAnimatedRectangle` has a particular timing animation applied to it by calling . remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 架構層級項目的衍生情況下，行為變更不應該 （而且也無法，除非您陰影）。For WPF framework-level element deriving scenarios, behavior for should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed. 相反地，您應該覆寫您類別中的實作。Instead, you should override the implementation in your class. 您在內部呼叫實作做為預設 WPF 架構層級配置作業的一部分。Your implementation is called internally by as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations. 您實作也應該呼叫上每個子項目，如果它具有子項目。Your implementation should also call on each child element, if it has child elements. WPF 核心層級項目的衍生情況下，行為變更不應該 （而且也無法，除非您陰影）。For WPF core-level element deriving scenarios, the behavior for should not (and cannot, unless you shadow) be changed. 相反地，您應該覆寫在您的類別。Instead, you should override in your class. 您在內部呼叫實作做為預設 WPF 架構層級配置作業的一部分。Your implementation is called internally by as part of default WPF framework-level layout operations. 不過，這是假設您使用 WPF 架構層級版面配置和其版面配置系統，這通常是不案例特別所衍生之 WPF 核心層級從位於項目，如果基底項目類別。However, this assumes you are using WPF framework-level layout and its layout system, which is often not the case if you are specifically deriving elements at the WPF core-level from the base element class. 您實作也應該呼叫上每個子項目，如果它具有子項目。Your implementation should also call on each child element, if it has child elements. 請注意 WPF 核心層級案例意味著您不使用衍生類別，因為標誌。Note that the WPF core-level scenario implies that you are not using a derived class, because seals . 計算中的 WPF 架構層級版面配置定位[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]組成呼叫和呼叫。Computation of WPF framework-level layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] consists of a call and an call. 期間呼叫，版面配置系統決定使用提供的項目大小需求(`availableSize`) 引數。During the call, the layout system determines an element's size requirements using a provided (`availableSize`) argument. 期間呼叫，版面配置系統終結大小和項目位置的週框方塊。During the call, the layout system finalizes the size and position of an element's bounding box. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[配置](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md). `availableSize` 可以是零到無限大之間的數字。`availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinity. 若要配置的項目傳回最小值它們需要透過`availableSize`參數。Elements to be laid out return the minimum they require through the `availableSize` parameter. 配置第一次具現化，它一律會接收之前，先呼叫。When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a call before . 不過之後第一次的版面配置傳遞，, 它可能會收到呼叫而不需要; 這種情形只會影響的屬性時變更 （例如對齊），或當父系收到沒有.However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an call without a ; this can happen when a property that affects only is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an without a . A呼叫將會自動讓失效呼叫。A call will automatically invalidate an call. 以非同步方式 （在版面配置系統所決定的時間） 通常會進行配置更新。Layout updates generally occur asynchronously (at a time determined by the layout system). 項目可能不會立即反映屬性會影響項目調整大小的變更 (例如)。An element might not immediately reflect changes to properties that affect element sizing (such as ). > [!NOTE] > 版面配置更新可以強制使用方法; 不過，呼叫這個函式則不建議，因為它通常不需要而且可能會導致效能不佳。Layout updates can be forced by using the method; however, calling this function is not recommended, as it is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance. 在許多情況下呼叫其中可能適合、 版面配置系統可能已經在處理更新。In many situations where calling might be appropriate, the layout system will probably already be processing updates. 版面配置系統可以處理版面配置變更，可以最佳化做為封裝一部分的所有必要更新的方式。The layout system can process layout changes in a manner that can optimize all necessary updates as part of a package. 版面配置系統會保留兩個不同的佇列的無效的版面配置，一個用於，另一個用於。The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for and one for . 配置佇列會根據使用的視覺化樹狀結構中的項目順序來排序。The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree. 在樹狀結構中較高的項目是佇列的頂端，以避免多餘的配置，在父系中重複的變更所造成。Elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, in order to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents. 從佇列中，會自動移除重複的項目和項目會自動從佇列中移除已有效。Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already valid. 當更新配置，佇列清空首先，後面接著佇列。When updating layout, the queue is emptied first, followed by the queue. 中的項目中的項目時，就永遠不會排列佇列佇列。An element in the queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the queue.

span.span: Defines the template for WPF core-level arrange layout definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 覆寫這個方法才適當所衍生的 WPF 核心層級，而且您不使用 WPF 架構層級配置系統和衍生類別，因為標誌。Overriding this method is only appropriate if you are deriving at the WPF core-level, and you are not using the WPF framework-level layout system and derived class, because seals . 如果您使用 WPF 架構層級配置系統，適當的方法來覆寫類別的特定配置排列行為是。If you are using the WPF framework-level layout system, the appropriate method to override for class-specific layout arrange behavior is . ## Examples 實作應該呼叫基底實作以傳回大小，然後呼叫方法的每個可見子項目的，而協調這些所傳回的大小呼叫基底實作的大小。 implementations should call the base implementation to return a size, then call the method of each visible child element, and reconcile the sizes returned by these calls with the size of the base implementation. 對帳外觀的邏輯實作可能有所不同，系統會根據項目的版面配置特性。The logic for the reconciliation aspect of a implementation might vary, depending on the layout characteristics of your element. 在下列的範例範本中，`VisualChildren`是假設性的屬性，您的項目可能會定義為了列舉其內容。未定義內容集合在此層級中，WPF 架構層級架構會延遲到衍生的項目，例如特定控制項或控制項的基底類別的內容行為。In the following example template, `VisualChildren` is a hypothetical property that your element might define to help enumerate its content; does not define content collections at this level, the WPF framework-level architecture defers content behavior to derived elements such as specific controls or control base classes. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementArrangeOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementarrangeoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementArrangeOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementarrangeoverride)]

para.span: 如果您正在開發的 WPF 核心層級的項目，您應該覆寫此方法以提供您的 WPF 核心層級項目唯一排列配置行為，或將適當的版面配置決策的相關項目的子項目。

span.span: If you are developing elements at the WPF core level,you should override this method to give your WPF core-level element a unique arrange layout behavior, or to make proper layout decisions about the child elements of your elements.

para.span: 覆寫可能會需要這些子項目不是從已定義的模式可辨識這類。

span.span: Starts an animation for a specified animated property on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您檢查屬性是否動畫效果時，請注意，動畫會開始視為動畫呈現非動畫的起始點的第一個框架時。When you check whether a property is animated, note that the animation will begin and be considered animated when the first frame beyond the non-animated starting point is rendered. 如果如`animation`是`null`，然後移除任何目前的動畫，並保留屬性的目前值。If the for `animation` is `null`, then any current animations are removed and the current value of the property is held. 如果整個`animation`值是`null`、 從屬性移除所有動畫和屬性值還原成其基底值。If the entire `animation` value is `null`, all animations are removed from the property and the property value reverts to its base value. 不過，並不會停止原先相關聯的動畫時間軸。However, the originally associated animation timeline is not stopped. 指派給該時間軸中的其他任何動畫會繼續執行。Any other animations assigned to that timeline will continue to run. ## Examples 下列範例會建立動畫、 指派，，然後呼叫來啟動它。The following example creates an animation, assigns it, and then calls to start it. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈現的版面配置中，會以視覺化方式裁剪幾何外部的項目。Elements outside the geometry will be visually clipped in the rendered layout. 幾何沒有是矩形。The geometry does not have to be rectangular. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 這個範例示範如何定義架構項目的區域。This example shows how to define a framework element's region. 若要定義剪輯，請使用(例如，設定項目的屬性。To define a clip, use a (for example, an to set the element's property. 只有是幾何的區域內的區域會顯示。Only the area that is within the region of the geometry will be visible. 下列範例所示沒有定義之裁剪區域的項目。The following example shows an element without a defined clip region. 因為定義沒有裁剪區域，則會顯示整個影像。Because no clip region is defined, the entire image is displayed. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#2)] ![套用裁剪區域之前的物件](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "套用裁剪區域之前的物件")![An object before applying a clip region](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-noclip.png "An object before applying a clip region") 不裁剪區域的映像Image with No Clip Region 在下一個範例中，會建立完全相同的映像，不同之處在於它有已定義之裁剪區域。In the next example, an identical Image is created, except that it has a defined clip region. 只有區域內的映像的一部分隨即出現。Only the part of the image that is within the area the will be displayed. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#4)] ![裁剪後的物件](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "裁剪後的物件")![A clipped object](~/add/media/mil-task-clip-region-ellispe.PNG "A clipped object") 橢圓形裁剪區域的映像Image with an Elliptical Clip Region 下列範例示範如何以動畫顯示架構項目的區域。The following example shows how animate a framework element's region. 在此範例中，用來定義的橢圓形的裁剪區域項目。In this example, an is used to define an elliptical clip region for an element. A繪製橢圓形的幾何從屬性 （0，0） 到 （200，150）。A animates the ellipse geometry's property from (0, 0) to (200, 150). 動畫開始播放後影像載入，不斷重複。The animation starts playing after the image is loaded and repeats indefinitely. [!code-xaml[ClipPathExample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClipPathExample/CS/ClipExample.xaml#5)] 如需完整的範例，請參閱[裁剪區域範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67)。For the full sample, see the [Clip Region Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/83043a0b-f824-445f-9675-103280c5ca67).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 子項目有不同的配置行為，根據是否的高度和寬度的父項目由決定影響 / 或 / .For child elements, has different effects on layout behaviors depending on whether the height and width of the parent element are being determined by / or / . / 父元素的值為何會一律遵守和有效裁剪一律會裁剪這些最大值為基礎的內容。 / of the parent element are always respected regardless of the value of and the effective clipping will always clip the content based on these maximums. 在父系的 / 設定不會裁剪的內容時是`false`，但會裁剪內容 if是`true`。The parent's / settings will not clip the content when is `false`, but will clip the content if is `true`. 請注意，預設為`false`是一般的行為，以實作類別。Note that defaulting to `false` is the general behavior as implemented in the class. 您可針對指定的項目衍生自覆寫這個屬性預設為該執行個體中的相依性屬性中繼資料`true`改為。It is possible for any given element that derives from to override the dependency property metadata for this property in that instance to default to `true` instead. 數個現有的衍生的類別覆寫此中繼資料及/或調整相依性屬性的預設值。Several existing derived classes override this metadata and/or adjust the dependency property default value. ，和每個覆寫這個預設值為`true`。, , and each override the default value to be `true`. 覆寫這個相依性屬性的中繼資料。 overrides the metadata for this dependency property. 具體來說，指定這個屬性可讓屬性值繼承 (是`true`中繼資料中)。Specifically, designates this property to allow property value inheritance ( is `true` in metadata). 在此內容中的屬性值繼承表示，如果有任何其他值作為具有子元素指派透過本機值或最接近的父元素的值指派 （同樣地，有兩種預設的樣式，此值與樣式值，或在本機值)，然後從父元素的值會指派給所有未指派的子元素屬性系統。Property value inheritance in this context means that if there are child elements with no other value for assigned through local values or styles, the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned (again, either in styles, by default values, or a locally value), then the value from the parent element will be assigned to all unassigned child elements by the property system. 實際上這表示您可以指定是否允許在根項目界限的剪輯，並將它做為值將會傳播到所有其子項目具有未特別指派`false`。In practice this means that you can specify whether to allow clip to bounds at the root element, and that value will propagate to all child elements that have not specifically assigned it as `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的另一種方式填入集合是使用方法以程式設計的方式。Another typical way to populate the collection is to use methods programmatically. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreCommandBindings**oneOrMoreCommandBindings* 一或多個項目。One or more elements. 每一個都應該有屬性設定為已知的命令，而且屬性設定為和處理常式實作。Each of these should have a attribute set to a known command, and attributes set for the and handler implementations. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information see . ## Examples 下列範例會將視窗使用的標記。The following example adds a to a window using markup. 請注意，在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、做為項目; 在標記中未宣告的集合物件由屬性會接受，型別推斷及填入屬性項目與一或多個項目：Note that in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the is not declared in the markup as an element; the collection object is inferred by the type that the property takes, and you populate the property element with one or more elements: [!code-xaml[commandWithHandler#CommandHandlerCommandBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/commandWithHandler/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandhandlercommandbinding)] 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法的集合，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for collections, see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 下列範例會執行基本上相同的動作程式碼中：The following example does essentially the same thing in code: [!code-csharp[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerBindingInit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandhandlerbindinginit)] [!code-vb[CommandHandlerProcedural#CommandHandlerBindingInit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandHandlerProcedural/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandhandlerbindinginit)]

summary.span: 嘗試將焦點設定至此項目。

span.span: Attempts to set focus to this element.

returns.span: 如果邏輯與鍵盤焦點設定至此項目，則為 ，如果只有邏輯焦點設為此項目，或是呼叫此方法並未強制焦點變更，則為 。

span.span: if keyboard focus and logical focus were set to this element; if only logical focus was set to this element, or if the call to this method did not force the focus to change.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要可設定焦點，和兩者都必須是`true`。To be focusable, and must both be `true`. 即使項目是在特定的樹狀結構中的可設定焦點且已啟用，事件處理，（例如，針對複合控制項） 可能會回應預覽焦點事件藉由禁止焦點，因此這個方法會傳回`false`。Even if an element is focusable and enabled, event handling within a specific tree, (such as for a composite control) might respond to the preview focus events by not allowing focus there, thus this method would return `false`. 焦點通常由兩個不同的概念： 鍵盤焦點和邏輯焦點，並不一定相同。Focus in general is governed by two separate concepts: keyboard focus and logical focus, which are not always identical. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)或[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md) or [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果呼叫傳回`true`，和也`true`。If calling returns `true`, and are also `true`. 如果相關的屬性尚未`true`，當您呼叫，一或多個下列事件會依照下列順序引發： ， （來源為新的焦點目標） ， ，， （來源為新的焦點目標）。If the related properties are not already `true`, when you call , one or more of the following events are raised in the following order: , (source is the new focus target), , , , (source is the new focus target). 為了讓這個呼叫才會成功，應用程式中的某個其他項目需要先前有焦點。In order for this call to be successful, some other element in the application needed to have focus previously. ## Examples 下列範例會將焦點設為所參考，並調整內游標的位置。The following example sets focus to a referenced by , and then adjusts the position of the cursor within the . [!code-csharp[TextBox_CursorToEnd#UIElementFocus](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBox_CursorToEnd/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementfocus)] [!code-vb[TextBox_CursorToEnd#UIElementFocus](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TextBox_CursorToEnd/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#uielementfocus)]

summary.span: 取得或設定元素是否能夠接收焦點的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the element can receive focus.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 如果項目可設定焦點則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the element is focusable; otherwise .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有已取得焦點的項目收到鍵盤輸入。Only the focused element receives keyboard input. 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]實際上會相依性屬性的屬性存取子。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property. 這個特定的相依性屬性相當常有衍生的項目類別，尤其是在控制項中以不同方式設定其明顯"default"值。This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes, particularly in controls. 這通常會發生在兩種方式之一：This commonly occurs in one of two ways: - 相依性屬性繼承自特定的衍生類別，但是，衍生類別覆寫之相依性屬性的中繼資料，並變更屬性的預設值。The dependency property is inherited by a particular derived class, but that derived class overrides the metadata of the dependency property and changes the property default value. - 樣式或範本套用至項目，以不同的方式設定該相依性屬性的值。A style or template is applied to an element, which sets that dependency property value differently. 例如，明顯 「 預設 」 的的控制項將會是`true`，即使繼承為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]直接從屬性。For example, the apparent "default" of for a control will be `true`, even though inherits as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property directly from . 這是因為套用的中繼資料值靜態建構函式內的相依性屬性遭到覆寫基底類別，之間平均分攤工作量和類別階層架構中。This is because the applied metadata value for the dependency property was overridden within the static constructor of the base class, which is situated between and in the class hierarchy. 當繼承或其衍生的類別，會重新定義預設值，這個屬性是`true`。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be `true`. 當繼承(也就是衍生的類別)，預設值一次重新定義為`false`。When inherited by (which is a derived class), the default value is again redefined to be `false`. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將說明特定的自訂控制項，這會設定控制項範本`false`上其中一個範本內的項目。The following example code illustrates a control template for a particular custom control, which sets `false` on one of the elements within the template. [!code-xaml[RichTextBox_NoScrollViewer#_ControlTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBox_NoScrollViewer/CS/window1.xaml#_controltemplate)]

block.para:
衍生自直接 (相對於從)，請考慮是否要讓您為可設定焦點，因為預設的項目將不是可設定焦點的項目。
When deriving from directly (as opposed to from ), consider whether you wish your element to be focusable, because by default the element will not be focusable.
如果您希望您可設定焦點的項目時，覆寫此屬性類型的靜態建構函式內的中繼資料，如下所示：
If you wish your element to be focusable, override the metadata for this property within your type's static constructor as follows:
[!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementShortOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementshortoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementShortOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementshortoverride)]
其中應該是類別名稱之類型的中繼資料值覆寫上。where should be the class name of the type that you are overriding the metadata value on.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetAnimationBaseValue(class System.Windows.DependencyProperty dp) cil managed
Public Function GetAnimationBaseValue (dp As DependencyProperty) As Object

span.span: The dependency property to check.

summary.span: 傳回這個項目上指定屬性的基底屬性值，不管任何執行中的可能動畫值，或停止動畫。

span.span: Returns the base property value for the specified property on this element, disregarding any possible animated value from a running or stopped animation.

returns.span: 屬性值，就好像指定的相依性屬性未附加任何動畫。

span.span: The property value as if no animations are attached to the specified dependency property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性未不附加任何動畫則傳回值一定是相同傳回值。If no animations are attached to the property, then the return value is always identical to the return value. 如果附加的動畫，然後所有的可能動畫衍生值包括開始和停止值會被忽略，而且屬性值取決於所有可能的輸入。If there are animations attached, then all possible animation derived values including the start and stop values are ignored, and the property value is determined based on all other possible inputs. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性值優先順序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)。For more information, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md). ## Examples 下列範例會實作報告動畫的基底值的處理常式屬性，以及轉換的基底值。The following example implements a handler that reports the base value of an animated property on a , as well as the base value of a transform. [!code-csharp[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#GetAnimationBaseValue](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/CSharp/GetAnimationBaseValueExample.cs#getanimationbasevalue)] [!code-vb[timingbehaviors_procedural_snip#GetAnimationBaseValue](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/timingbehaviors_procedural_snip/visualbasic/getanimationbasevalueexample.vb#getanimationbasevalue)]

summary.span: 傳回替代裁剪幾何，該裁剪幾何表示若 屬性設為 時會裁剪的區域。

span.span: Returns an alternative clipping geometry that represents the region that would be clipped if were set to .
The potential clipping geometry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會傳回合法的值，但未使用`layoutSlotSize`在其計算中的參數。The default implementation will return a legitimate value, but does not use the `layoutSlotSize` parameter in its calculations. 而是使用的值。Instead it uses the value of . 本質上覆寫這個方法由立即衍生類別，而覆寫會產生更複雜的行為，在一般的 WPF 架構層級項目。This method is substantially overridden by the immediately derived class, and the override produces a more sophisticated behavior for general WPF framework-level elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.DependencyObject GetUIParentCore() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function GetUIParentCore () As DependencyObject

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，如果沒有視覺化父項目存在，則會為這個項目傳回替代的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 父項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an alternative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] parent for this element if no visual parent exists.

returns.span: 一個物件，如果衍生類別的實作有替代父代連接要報告。

span.span: An object, if implementation of a derived class has an alternate parent connection to report.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的虛擬實作這個方法會傳回`null`。The default virtual implementation of this method returns `null`. 提供實際的實作。 provides a practical implementation. 替代的父代是用於事件的路由，在其中項目會建立替代父結構，讓它的事件會路由傳送偏離標準模式的視覺化樹狀目錄以標準的父代，路由的方式的情況下或在中向下預覽路由策略。Alternative parents are used for event routing, in cases where an element creates an alternative parent structure so that its events are routed in a way that diverges from the standard pattern of routing up the visual tree to the standard parent, or downward in the preview routing strategy.

summary.span: 輸入系統報告其下牽涉此元素的拖放事件時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the input system reports an underlying drag-and-drop event that involves this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件允許拖曳事件修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的來源。The event allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. 視覺回應強調拖放作業正在進行。The visual feedback reinforces that a drag-and-drop operation is in process. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 此元素取得邏輯焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同的範圍與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中，鍵盤焦點會維持其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目已從`false`至`true`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route is changed from `false` to `true`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，接收焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that receives focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 鍵盤以此元素為焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是類似的事件可追蹤之屬性維護的項目; 焦點狀態中的狀態變更的許多相同的情況下，就會引發事件。 is a similar event that tracks status changes in a property that maintains the focus state for an element; the event is raised in many of the same circumstances. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為具有焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際具有焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event GotMouseCapture As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素擷取滑鼠時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element captures the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使將滑鼠指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the mouse pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取並且擷取之前拖放作業的拖放動作發生。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations and remains captured until the drop action of the drag-and-drop operation occurs. 這個事件會使用反昇路由，因為已擷取的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that has capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查資料，以判斷實際項目具有滑鼠擷取的事件。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that has mouse capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InputBindings As InputBindingCollection

summary.span: 取得與此元素關聯的輸入繫結集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of input bindings associated with this element.

value.span: 輸入繫結的集合。

span.span: The collection of input bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入繫結支援命令與輸入裝置繫的結。Input bindings support the binding of commands to input devices. 例如，實作輸入包含的滑鼠裝置特定內容的繫結。For example, implements input bindings that include properties that are particular to mouse devices. 輸入繫結的集合會包含屬於此類型的輸入繫結以及宣告執行個體的輸入繫結。The collection of input bindings will include both input bindings that pertain to the type as well as input bindings that are declared on the instance. 相關的屬性， ，維持命令繫結的集合。A related property, , maintains a collection of command bindings. 這些不同從輸入繫結，因為它們代表的下一個層級的動作會繫結至已知命令的命令處理。These differ from input bindings in that they represent the next level down of command processing - actions that are tied to known commands. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreInputBindings**oneOrMoreInputBindings* 一或多個項目 (通常或衍生類別)。One or more elements (typically the or derived classes). 每一個都應該要有和屬性設定。Each of these is expected to have a and attribute set. ## Examples 下列範例會填入這個屬性上，具有單一。The following example populates this property on a , with a single . [!code-xaml[CommandingOverviewSnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法的集合，請參閱[XAML 語法的詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax for collections, see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回為傳回類型，因為該類型是兩者的通用介面和。 is returned as the return type, because that type is a common interface for both and . 然後可以適當地轉型傳回型別或使用介面的執行個體所定義的特定成員介面。You can then cast the return type appropriately, or use the interface instance for certain members that are defined by the interface. 呼叫這個方法通常是無法從應用程式程式碼。This method typically is not called from your application code. 呼叫這個方法僅適用於您想要重新實作大量已出現，例如滑鼠裝置的邏輯重新建立的低階輸入功能。Calling this method is only appropriate if you intend to re-implement a substantial amount of the low level input features that are already present, such as recreating mouse device logic. 合約相同的簽章，某些項目選擇明確實作的方法。 contracts an method with the same signature, which some elements choose to implement explicitly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateArrange() cil managed

summary.span: 使項目的排列狀態 (配置) 失效。

span.span: Invalidates the arrange state (layout) for the element.

summary.span: 在失效之後，項目會更新其配置，且這是非同步發生，除非後續由 所強制。

span.span: After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously unless subsequently forced by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 經常呼叫或在特定的有顯著的效能影響。Frequent calls to or in particular to have significant performance consequences. 因此，除非絕對需要精確的配置狀態的其他後續呼叫，呼叫這個方法來避免[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]程式碼中。Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code. 進階的案例，您可能會呼叫是如果您建立不在相依性屬性的或衍生類別，其變更時，仍然會影響版面配置的排列傳遞。An advanced scenario where you might call is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the arrange pass of layout when it changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateMeasure() cil managed

summary.span: 使項目的測量狀態 (配置) 失效。

span.span: Invalidates the measurement state (layout) for the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法也會呼叫就內部而言，不是需要呼叫和連續。Calling this method also calls internally, there is no need to call and in succession. 之後失效，項目將擁有其配置更新，會以非同步的方式，除非呼叫以強制變更同步的配置。After the invalidation, the element will have its layout updated, which will occur asynchronously, unless is called to force a synchronous layout change. WPF 架構層級配置系統會其自己的變更項目的視覺化樹狀結構中處理，並在最常見版面配置失效的情況下版面配置系統會呼叫這個方法只有在必要時對等項目。The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and in most common layout invalidation cases the layout system is calling the equivalent of this method when necessary. 如果您要產生完整的版面配置的實作，可直接操作項目樹狀結構中，或類似進階案例，您才應該呼叫這個方法。You should only call this method if you are producing a complete layout implementation, which does direct manipulation of the element tree, or similar advanced scenarios. 這類進階的案例之一是如果您建立不在相依性屬性的或衍生類別，仍然會影響配置的測量行程，當監視變更。One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the measure pass of layout when it changes. 經常呼叫或在特定的有顯著的效能影響。Frequent calls to or in particular to have significant performance consequences. 因此，除非絕對需要精確的配置狀態的其他後續呼叫，呼叫這個方法來避免[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]程式碼中。Therefore, avoid calling this method unless you absolutely require precise layout state for subsequent calls to other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void InvalidateVisual() cil managed

summary.span: 讓項目的呈現失效，並強制全新的配置傳遞。

span.span: Invalidates the rendering of the element, and forces a complete new layout pass.

summary.span: 在配置週期完成後，會呼叫 。

span.span: is called after the layout cycle is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫內部。This method calls internally. 從您的應用程式程式碼不通常呼叫這個方法。This method is not generally called from your application code. WPF 架構層級配置系統沒有自己的變更項目的視覺化樹狀結構中處理，會呼叫這個方法只有在必要時對等項目已經。The WPF framework-level layout system does its own handling of changes in the visual tree of an element, and would be calling the equivalent of this method when necessary already. 僅適用於進階案例，必須呼叫這個方法。Calling this method is necessary only for advanced scenarios. 這類進階的案例之一是如果您建立不在相依性屬性的或衍生類別，當監視變更，仍會影響配置。One such advanced scenario is if you are creating a for a dependency property that is not on a or derived class that still influences the layout when it changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsArrangeValid As Boolean
public: property bool IsArrangeValid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示在此項目之配置中子項目的計算大小和位置是有效的。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the computed size and position of child elements in this element's layout are valid.

value.span: 如果配置的大小和位置有效則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以強制排列方式以透過呼叫失效在這個項目 （或其父代）。You can force arrangement to be invalidated by calling on this element (or its parents). 此旗標 at 次例如版面配置系統決定重新編輯畫的配置。This flags the layout for recomposition at such time as the layout system determines. 或者，若要立即呼叫無法進行，但這應該只有在執行如果確定沒有進一步的失效暫止 （大量不必要地強制更新會影響效能）。Alternatively, an immediate call to could be made, but this should only be done if it is certain that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates has performance consequences). 不能`true`除非也`true`（版面配置處理序中排列不能有效而不先在 有效的度量）。 cannot be `true` unless is also `true` (in the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意這個屬性會受到特定類別的實作特定項目，通常在執行階段。Note that this property is influenced by class-specific implementations of on particular elements, often at runtime. 因此，此處所列的預設值有時不是有效。Therefore, the default value listed here is sometimes not effective. 比方說，將`false`每當判斷為不需要支援捲軸。For instance, a will be `false` whenever it is determined that there is no need to support a scrollbar. 嘗試設定此值將也可能會覆寫所傳回的值。Attempting to set this value will also potentially be overridden by the value returned by . 未啟用的項目不會參與點擊測試或焦點，而且不會因此輸入事件的來源。Elements that are not enabled do not participate in hit testing or focus and therefore will not be sources of input events. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例顯示處理常式上一個 按鈕時執行的將設定`false`上另一個具名的按鈕`b1`。The following example shows a handler on one button that when executed will set `false` on another named button `b1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某個應用程式多個焦點分區，例如功能表內容和應用程式的其餘部分之間，可能會與鍵盤焦點不同邏輯焦點。Logical focus might differ from keyboard focus if an application has multiple focus divisions, such as between menu contents and the remainder of the application. 在此案例中，應用程式 UI 的一個項目上只能是鍵盤焦點，不過，其他焦點分割中的特定項目可能仍會保留邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus can only be on one element of the application UI, however, certain elements in other focus divisions might still retain logical focus. 如需有關邏輯焦點的詳細資訊，請參閱[焦點概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on logical focus, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 您未設定此屬性 （它是唯讀） 設定焦點。You do not set focus by setting this property (it is read-only). 這個屬性的典型用法就是使用它作為相依性屬性的或。The typical use for this property is to use it as a dependency property for a or . 若要以程式設計方式設定焦點，呼叫。To set focus programmatically, call . 藉由使用者動作或控制項實作，其中可能包括滑鼠捕捉行為，也可以設定焦點。Focus can also be set by user action or by control implementations, which possibly include mouse capture behavior. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會變更控制項的背景，當它主要針對程式碼處理常式。The following example is a code handler that changes the background of a control when it is focused. [!code-csharp[PopupSimple#IsFocused](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupSimple/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#isfocused)] 另一個常見的方式來達成這個相同的效果是放置中的控制項; 這種方法不需要處理程式碼後置的特定事件，而且可讓設計工具的互動式和圖形本質更大的存取[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Another common way to achieve this same effect is to place a in the of a control; this approach does not require handling specific events with code-behind and allows designers greater access to the interactive and graphical nature of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 如需範例，請參閱[How to： 建立外部的光暈效果](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1)。For an example, see [How to: Create an Outer Glow Effect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a2ccf19a-d0dc-4e3c-88e3-95d7f7d765b1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的有效值會受到點擊測試的項目邏輯樹狀中的相對位置。The effective value of this property is influenced by the relative positions of hit testable elements in the logical tree. 比方說，如果某個元素的子元素的項目，不會叫用測試顯示，將會繼續的子系上屬性的有效值`false`，即使嘗試在本機設定該值。For instance, if an element is a child element of an element that is not hit test visible, the effective value of the property on the child will remain `false`, even if attempting to set that value locally. 基於這個理由，請務必確認您未設定至`false`複合控制項上，除非您不想要的任何輸入或的點擊測試該控制項。For this reason, it is important that you do not set to `false` on a composited control unless you do not want any input or hit testing on that control. 如需點擊測試的詳細資訊，請參閱[視覺分層中的點擊測試](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md)。For more information on hit testing, see [Hit Testing in the Visual Layer](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/hit-testing-in-the-visual-layer.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以強制度量和排列方式以透過呼叫失效在這個項目 （或視覺化樹狀結構的任何父項目）。You can force measurement and arrangement to be invalidated by calling on this element (or any parent element up the visual tree). 這會指定配置以重新編輯畫以非同步的方式，取決於版面配置系統一次發生。This designates the layout for recomposition asynchronously, occurring at a time determined by the layout system. 或者，您可以進行的立即呼叫。Alternatively, you could make an immediate call to . 不過，您應該只呼叫如果很可能沒有進一步的失效暫止 （大量不必要地強制更新會有影響效能）。However, you should only call if it is likely that no further invalidations are pending (a large number of unnecessarily forced updates will have performance consequences). 如果是`false`，也必須是`false`（版面配置處理序，強制執行邏輯，排列方式不能有效而不先在 有效的度量）。If is `false`, must also be `false` (by the enforced logic of the layout process, arrangement cannot be valid without measurement first being valid).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果滑鼠指標常值的項目，因為其適用於點擊測試。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the mouse pointer is over the literal element—as it is for a hit test. 如果滑鼠指標位於子項目上方，特別是在項目一部分的項目更深入的範本和複合 （compositing），這個屬性會是`false`。If the mouse pointer is instead over a child element, in particular over elements that are part of an element's deeper template and compositing, this property will be `false`. 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果將滑鼠擷取由這個項目，而且這個屬性為`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會繼續傳回`true`直到失去滑鼠捕捉但其範圍不是指標。If the mouse is captured by this element, and this property is `true` at time of capture, this property will continue to return `true` until mouse capture is lost and the pointer is not over its bounds. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

span.span: if mouse pointer is over the element or its child elements; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，控制項是複合的控制項 （視覺化樹狀結構） 內的各種項目都會報告包含控制項的滑鼠狀態。Typically, controls are composited such that the various elements inside the control (the visual tree) will all report the mouse state for the containing control. 例如，樣式控制項將會報告為`true`如果滑鼠任意處是它的幾何，包括任何。For example, a style control will report as `true` if the mouse is anywhere over its geometry, including any . 雖然類似"IsMouseOverChanged 」 事件不存在，便會執行數個類似的事件。Although an analogous "IsMouseOverChanged" event does not exist, several similar events do. 例如，您可以處理， ，和。For example, you can handle , , and . 如果此元素擷取滑鼠，這個屬性會保留`true`直到已失去滑鼠捕捉滑鼠指標離開項目範圍。If this element captures the mouse, this property remains `true` until mouse capture is lost and the mouse pointer leaves the element bounds. 有些控制項刻意捕捉滑鼠上似乎沒有直接牽涉到滑鼠特定動作。Some controls deliberately capture the mouse on certain actions that do not appear to directly involve the mouse. 這可能會導致正在`true`即使看似沒有移動滑鼠。This can lead to being `true` even though the mouse has not apparently moved. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會參考這個屬性的屬性類型為，屬於\ 區塊。The following example references this property as the property type of a , part of a \ block. 如果滑鼠位於控制項上，控制項文字會變成藍色，資料指標會變成手的形狀。If the mouse is over the control, the control text turns blue and the cursor becomes a hand. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於，這個屬性才`true`如果手寫筆在元素上方。Unlike , this property is only `true` if the stylus is over the element. 如果手寫筆改為透過子元素或元素的更深入的複合 （視覺化樹狀結構） 的一部分的項目，這個屬性會是`false`。If the stylus is instead over a child element or over elements that are part of an element's deeper compositing (the visual tree), this property will be `false`. 除非您知道控制項的複合 （例如，您使用這個屬性的自訂控制項範本中的控制項，您定義），這個屬性可能會傳回非預期的結果。Unless you know how a control is composited (for example, you use this property in a custom control template for a control that you define), this property might return unexpected results. 大部分的情況下都不製作控制項，使用改為。For most scenarios where you are not authoring controls, use instead. 如果這個項目具有手寫筆擷取，而且這個屬性是`true`在擷取時，這個屬性會保持`true`直到手寫筆擷取遺失，且其範圍不是手寫筆。If this element has stylus capture and this property is `true` at the time of capture, this property remains `true` until stylus capture is lost and the stylus is not over its bounds. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 判斷值會考量所有配置的因素。Determination of the value takes all factors of layout into account. 相反地， ，這是可設定的屬性，只表示要以程式設計的方式讓項目，可見或不可見。In contrast, , which is a settable property, only indicates the intention to programmatically make an element visible or invisible. 項目位置是`false`參與輸入的事件 （或命令），請執行不影響量值或排列傳遞的版面配置，不是可設定焦點、 索引標籤順序而且不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is `false` do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the measure or arrange passes of layout, are not focusable, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 相較之下，項目位置是`false`仍會參與事件和命令，以及點擊測試，但是也不是可設定焦點。In contrast, elements where is `false` will still participate in events and commands, and hit testing, but are also not focusable. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 焦點在這個項目上方且按下按鍵時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while focus is on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 是可能無法如預期般特定控制項的較低層級文字輸入的事件。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 這是因為有些控制項會有複合控制項，或提供文字的高階版本的類別處理輸入處理和相關事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加這個類別的事件，讓屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 當目前 的數個關聯視覺化項目的配置變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the layout of the various visual elements associated with the current changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 配置更新可能會發生在屬性變更、 視窗調整大小或明確的使用者要求的結果。A layout update can occur as a result of a property change, a window resize, or an explicit user request. 這個成員是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，則不是路由的事件。This member is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not a routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LostFocus As RoutedEventHandler

summary.span: 此元素失去邏輯焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element loses logical focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用方法呼叫刻意強制焦點，但上一個鍵盤焦點存在於不同範圍中，則邏輯焦點會與鍵盤焦點不同。Logical focus differs from keyboard focus if focus is deliberately forced away by using a method call but the previous keyboard focus exists in a different scope. 在此案例中、 鍵盤焦點會維持為，其所在和項目位置方法呼叫仍取得邏輯焦點。In this scenario, keyboard focus remains where it is, and the element where a method is called still gets logical focus. 這個事件的更精確的解釋是它時引發的值屬性路由的項目從變更`true`至`false`。A more precise interpretation of this event is that it is raised when the value of the property of an element in the route changes from `true` to `false`. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際取得焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that gained focus. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有任何對應通道的事件。There is no corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目捕捉到滑鼠時，它收到滑鼠輸入，即使指標位於其範圍外。When an element captures the mouse, it receives mouse input even if the pointer is outside its bounds. 滑鼠通常只會在拖放作業期間擷取。The mouse is typically captured only during drag-and-drop operations. 由於這個事件會使用反昇路由，失去擷取項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses bubbling routing, the element that loses capture might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際遺失擷取的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost capture. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Occurs when a manipulation and inertia on the object is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取得之操作的相關資訊，完成時，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to get information about the manipulation when it completes. 例如，您可以使用屬性來判斷總量操作的位置變更。For example, you can use the property to determine the total amount the position of the manipulation changed. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .|

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ManipulationDelta As EventHandler(Of ManipulationDeltaEventArgs)

summary.span: 輸入裝置在操作期間變更位置時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the input device changes position during a manipulation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件在當使用者拖曳手指螢幕操作期間，一次慣性發生時，就會發生多次。The event occurs multiple times when the user drags fingers over the screen during a manipulation and again when inertia occurs. 您可以使用屬性檢查事件是否發生在慣性期間。You can use the property to check whether the event is occurring during inertia. 使用的項目不影響任何方式在事件發生時，事件就會發生。The element on with event occurs is not affected in any way when the event occurs. 您必須提供邏輯以可操作的項目。You must provide the logic to the element that is to be manipulated. 和屬性，這些型別的屬性，包含有關如何變更操作的位置資料，而解譯為移動、 調整大小或旋轉的物件。The and properties, which are of type , contain data about how the position of the manipulations change and interpreted as moving, resizing, or rotating an object. 您可將該資訊套用至可操作的項目中。You apply that information to the element that is to be manipulated. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件。The following example shows an event handler for the event. 此範例會使用屬性來移動、 調整大小，和旋轉。The example uses the property to move, resize, and rotate a . 此範例也會檢查是否慣性和矩形是否接觸視窗邊緣期間發生的事件。The example also checks whether the event occurred during inertia and whether the rectangle is touching the edge of a window. 如果這種情況下，應用程式會停止操作，若要防止將應用程式的可見區域的矩形。If those cases are true, the application stops the manipulation to prevent the rectangle from leaving the visible area of the application. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ManipulationInertiaStarting As EventHandler(Of ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs)

summary.span: 當輸入裝置在操作期間失去和 物件的通訊以及慣性開始時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the input device loses contact with the object during a manipulation and inertia begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於使用者將取消所有從螢幕的指操作期間。The event occurs when the user lifts all of the fingers from the screen during a manipulation. 例如，如果使用者 」 會擲回 「跨介面，使用者將觸控開始的動作，請將手指移短的距離，畫面上，然後放開。For example, if a user "throws" a across a surface, the user will touch the to begin the action, move the finger across the screen for a short distance, and then release the . 當使用者放開項目時，會開始慣性和就會發生事件。When the user releases the element, inertia begins and the event occurs. 會繼續接收事件，以指出慣性發生之項目上。The continues to receive events to indicate that inertia is occurring on the element. 若要指定慣性的行為，您可以使用此事件。You can use this event to specify the behavior of the inertia. 例如，您可以設定慣性開始時所使用的初始速度。For example, you can set the initial velocity that is used when inertia begins. 藉由設定所需的減速或設定所需的位置，您也可以指定慣性數量。You can also specify the amount of inertia by setting the desired deceleration or by setting the desired placement. 您可以個別設定每一種操作 （轉譯、 擴充或旋轉） 的這些值。You can set these values for each type of manipulation (translation, expansion, or rotation) independently. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定所需的減速的轉譯、 擴充，以及使用慣性期間的旋轉。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後就會發生事件事件。The event occurs after the event. 您可以使用下列:You can do the following with the : - 取得操作的位置是相對於使用的項目屬性。Get the element that the manipulation's position is relative to by using the property. - 取得操作的原點使用屬性。Get the origin of the manipulation by using the property. - 藉由呼叫取消操作方法。Cancel the manipulation by calling the method. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .|

summary.span: 發生於第一次建立操作處理器時。

span.span: Occurs when the manipulation processor is first created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生在具有的項目上屬性設定為`true`當使用者將手指放在其上。The event occurs on an element that has the property set to `true` when the user puts a finger on it. 根據預設，後續的操作事件報告的位置相對於元素具有操作設`true`。By default, subsequent manipulation events report the position of the manipulation relative to the element that has set to `true`. 您可以指定，位置必須是相對於另一個項目，藉由設定屬性。You can specify that the position should be relative to another element by setting the property. 比方說，您可以進行此操作相對於項目的父代。For example, you can make the manipulation relative to the parent of the element. 您也可以執行的事件處理常式中的下列:You can also do the following in an event handler for : - 指定使用者是否需要多個執行的操作，藉由設定手指屬性。Specify whether the user needs more than one finger to perform the manipulations by setting the property. - 指定依設定會啟用何種類型的操作屬性列舉型別。Specify which types of manipulation are enabled by setting the property to a enumeration. - 設定指定單指旋轉中心的屬性。Specify the center of a single-finger rotation by setting the property. - 藉由呼叫取消操作方法。Cancel the manipulation by calling the method. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| ## Examples 下列範例顯示的事件處理常式事件和集合接收管理事件，讓操作的座標是相對於父項與父元素。The following example shows the event handler for the event and sets the to the parent element that receives the manipulation events so that the coordinates of the manipulation are relative to the parent element. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). span.span: The available space that a parent element can allocate a child element.

param.span: 子項目可以要求比可用空間更大的空間；如果在目前項目的內容模型中能夠捲動，就可能容納提供的大小。

summary.span: 更新 的 。
