summary.span: 父項目會從其自己的 實作呼叫這個方法，以形成遞迴配置更新。

span.span: Parent elements call this method from their own implementations to form a recursive layout update.

summary.span: 呼叫此方法即構成配置更新的第一次傳遞 (「量值」傳遞)。

span.span: Calling this method constitutes the first pass (the "Measure" pass) of a layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 計算的版面配置定位在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]組成呼叫和呼叫。Computation of layout positioning in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] is comprised of a call and an call. 期間呼叫時，項目決定其大小需求使用`availableSize`輸入。During the call, an element determines its size requirements by using an `availableSize` input. 期間完成呼叫時，項目大小。During the call, the element size is finalized. `availableSize` 可為任何介於 0 到無限。`availableSize` can be any number from zero to infinite. 參與配置的項目應該會傳回最小值它們需要針對給定`availableSize`。Elements participating in layout should return the minimum they require for a given `availableSize`. 配置第一次具現化，它一律會接收之前，先呼叫。When a layout is first instantiated, it always receives a call before . 不過之後第一次的版面配置傳遞，, 它可能會收到呼叫而不需要; 這種情形只會影響的屬性時變更 （例如對齊），或當父系收到沒有.However, after the first layout pass, it may receive an call without a ; this can happen when a property that affects only is changed (such as alignment), or when the parent receives an without a . A呼叫將會自動讓失效呼叫。A call will automatically invalidate an call. 主要執行緒並未等待的每一個可能的版面配置變更，以非同步的方式，會配置更新。Layout updates happen asynchronously, such that the main thread is not waiting for every possible layout change. 查詢透過程式碼後置檢查的屬性值的項目可能不會立即反映變更互動的調整大小或版面配置特性的屬性 (內容，例如)。Querying an element via code-behind checking of property values may not immediately reflect changes to properties that interact with the sizing or layout characteristics (the property, for example). > [!NOTE] > 版面配置更新可以強制使用方法。Layout updates can be forced by using the method. 不過，呼叫這個方法通常不需要而且可能會導致效能不佳。However, calling this method is usually unnecessary and can cause poor performance. 版面配置系統會保留兩個不同的佇列的無效的版面配置，一個用於，另一個用於。The layout system keeps two separate queues of invalid layouts, one for and one for . 配置佇列會根據執行版面配置; 項目的視覺化樹狀結構中項目的順序排序在樹狀結構中較高的項目是在佇列中，以避免多餘的配置，在父系中重複的變更所造成的頂端。The layout queue is sorted based upon the order of elements in the visual tree of the element performing layout; elements higher in the tree are at the top of the queue, to avoid redundant layouts caused by repeated changes in parents. 從佇列中，會自動移除重複的項目和項目會自動從佇列中移除已配置驗證。Duplicate entries are automatically removed from the queue, and elements are automatically removed from the queue if they are already layout-validated. 當更新配置，佇列清空首先，後面接著佇列。When updating layout, the queue is emptied first, followed by the queue. 中的項目中的項目時，就永遠不會排列佇列佇列。An element in the queue will never be arranged if there is an element in the queue.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Size MeasureCore(valuetype System.Windows.Size availableSize) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function MeasureCore (availableSize As Size) As Size

param.name: availableSize
param.span: 父項目可以配置給子項目使用的大小。

span.span: The available size that the parent element can allocate for the child.

summary.span: 任一項目在衍生類別中被覆寫時，會提供可以正確調整該項目的度量邏輯，並且也會同時考慮所有子項目內容的大小。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, provides measurement logic for sizing this element properly, with consideration of the size of any child element content.

returns.span: 這個項目在配置中需要的大小。

span.span: The desired size of this element in layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較常衍生的項目從而不是。It is more common to derive an element from rather than . 如果您衍生自，請注意，覆寫上標誌方法。If you are deriving from , note that an override of on seals the method. 因此，您只會覆寫做為 alter 配置量值的特性，如果您是衍生自透過不含繼承。Therefore, you only override as a means to alter layout measure characteristics if you derive from through an inheritance that does not include . 如果您嘗試建置您自己的實作，這可能是大小寫[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]核心層級。This might be the case if you are attempting to build your own implementation on the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] core-level. 否則，如果您衍生自，則量值的行為的實作範本是的實作。。Otherwise, if you are deriving from , then the implementation template for Measure behavior is the implementation of .. 父項目具有子元素必須呼叫上每個子系，否則這些子元素不調整大小或排列，便會有效地在版面配置中消失。A parent element with child elements must call on each child, otherwise these child elements are not sized or arranged and will effectively disappear from layout. ## Examples 典型的覆寫的遵循此近似模式 (不是內建集合，稱為`VisualChildren`;`VisualChildren`是一個預留位置，表示您的項目會維護任何子系集合)。A typical override of follows this approximate pattern (there is not a built-in collection called `VisualChildren`; `VisualChildren` is a placeholder that represents whatever child collection your element maintains). [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#uielementmeasureoverride)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#UIElementMeasureOverride](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#uielementmeasureoverride)] - 您必須呼叫每個子項目上。You must call on each child element. - 一般而言，您的實作應該快取間的度量資訊和方法會呼叫相同的項目中。Generally, your implementation should cache measurement information between the and method calls in the same element. - 呼叫的基底實作不是必要的但是可能適合基底實作提供所需的版面配置功能。Calling base implementations of is not required, but might be appropriate if the base implementation provides a desired layout capability. - 呼叫子系上項目應該傳遞相同`availableSize`做為父系或子區域的集合，根據的配置類型的父項目支援。Calls to on child elements should pass either the same `availableSize` as the parent, or a subset of the area, depending on the type of layout the parent element supports. 比方說，它會有效移除的項目特定框線或填補、 捲軸或自訂控制項的區域。For example, it would be valid to remove the area for an element-specific border or padding, a scrollbar, or a custom control.

para.span: 實作必須能夠處理提供給值，為無限。

span.span: Implementations must be able to process a value provided for that is infinite.

para.span: 無限值表示沒有要求的條件約束，而實際上會延遲度量選擇父項目，透過遞迴呼叫量值。

span.span: An infinite value indicates no requested constraints, and effectively defers measurement choice to the parent element, through recursive Measure calls.

para.span: 實作可以考慮針對提供的值是軟性條件約束。

span.span: Implementations can consider the value provided for to be a soft constraint.

para.span: 子元素可能會指定較大的大小，即使應用程式程式碼其他方面仍可判斷目前的實際大小的父項目。

span.span: The child element might specify a larger size, even if other aspects of application code were able to determine the current actual size of the parent element.

para.span: 大型要求是一項慣例，指出父項目是否可以支援內容捲動內容的顯示區域內查詢的子項目。

span.span: The large size request is a convention that indicates that the child element is querying whether your parent element can support content scrolling within a content display region.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制項可能會繼承的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。Some controls might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseEnter As MouseEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標進入此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然時滑鼠指標進入項目的邊界時發生，此事件的詳細追蹤逐字報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse pointer enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. A (或任何衍生的類別) 有原生處理的事件時按鈕具有焦點，且已按下的索引鍵空格鍵。A (or any derived class) has native handling for a event when the button has focus, and the pressed key is the space bar. 原生處理引發與做為來源，按鈕的事件，即使似乎移動滑鼠指標，也會擷取滑鼠。The native handling raises the event with the button as the source, and also captures the mouse, even though the mouse pointer does not appear to move. 因為滑鼠捕捉，與做為來源按鈕也會引發事件。As a result of the mouse capture, a event is also raised with the button as the source. 一般而言，如果項目捕捉滑鼠，然後引發時，以及和可能是其他控制項的特定事件。In general, if an element captures the mouse, then is raised, as well as and possibly other control-specific events. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 滑鼠指標離開此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer leaves the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然曲目，當滑鼠離開項目時，此事件多逐字報告屬性值已經從`true`至`false`這個項目上。Although tracks when the mouse leaves an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `true` to `false` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseLeaveEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeaveEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這看起來進行反昇路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a bubbling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . > [!IMPORTANT] > 某些控制項類別可能具有固有的類別處理滑鼠按鈕的事件。Some control classes might have inherent class handling for mouse button events. 滑鼠左鍵按下事件是最有可能有控制項中的類別處理事件。The left mouse button down event is the most likely event to have class handling in a control. 處理通常類別標示基礎為已處理的類別事件。The class handling often marks the underlying class event as handled. 一旦處理標記事件，通常無法引發另一個執行個體處理常式附加至該元素。Once the event is marked handled, other instance handlers that are attached to that element are not ordinarily raised. 不通常也會引發任何其他類別或執行個體的處理常式附加到反昇方向朝向 UI 樹狀目錄中的根項目。Any other class or instance handlers that are attached to elements in the bubbling direction towards the root in the UI tree are also not ordinarily raised. 您可以解決問題，會在前面的重要概述，仍然會接收滑鼠左鍵，往下處理使用其中一個這些方案的類別衍生類別上的事件的事件：You can resolve the issue that is outlined in the preceding Important and still receive events for left mouse button down events on a derived class that has class handling by using either of these solutions: - 附加的處理常式未標示為已由控制項所處理的事件。Attach handlers for the event, which is not marked as handled by the controls. 請注意，因為這是預覽事件時，路由從根目錄開始，並透過通道傳送到控制項。Notice that because this is a preview event, the route starts at the root and tunnels down to the control. - 藉由呼叫可循序註冊控制項上的處理常式，然後選擇讓接聽事件，即使它們已標示為已處理路由的事件資料中的處理常式的簽章選項。Register a handler on the control procedurally by calling and choosing the signature option that enables handlers to listen for events even if they are already marked as handled in the routed event data. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent MouseLeftButtonDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly MouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event MouseUp As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 在此元素上方放開任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應至其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的版本。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a release of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly MouseUpEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且使用者滾動滑鼠滾輪時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到事件從取得焦點或擷取的項目，將滑鼠指標可能實際上是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive the event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveFocus(class System.Windows.Input.TraversalRequest request) cil managed
Public Overridable Function MoveFocus (request As TraversalRequest) As Boolean

param.name: request
param.span: 包含屬性的周遊要求，該屬性指出在現有定位順序中周遊的模式，或以視覺化方式移動的方向。

span.span: A traversal request, which contains a property that indicates either a mode to traverse in existing tab order, or a direction to move visually.

summary.span: 嘗試將焦點從這個項目移至另一個項目。

span.span: Attempts to move focus from this element to another element.

summary.span: 移動焦點的方向是由指引方向所指定，該指引方向是在這個項目之視覺化父代的組織內解譯。

span.span: The direction to move focus is specified by a guidance direction, which is interpreted within the organization of the visual parent for this element.

returns.span: 如果已執行要求的周遊則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the requested traversal was performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請確定您檢查此方法的傳回值。Make sure you check the return value of this method. 傳回值為`false`如果周遊時碰到的定位點由控制項的組合所定義，並周遊要求未包裝要求可能會傳回。A return value of `false` might be returned if the traversal runs into a tab stop that is defined by a control's composition, and the traversal request did not request to wrap.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAccessKey(class System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAccessKey (e As AccessKeyEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 便捷鍵事件的事件資料。

span.span: The event data to the access key event.

param.span: 該事件資料會報告叫用哪個便捷鍵，並指出控制這些事件之傳送的 物件，是否也會將這個便捷鍵引動過程傳送至其他項目。

span.span: The event data reports which key was invoked, and indicate whether the object that controls the sending of these events also sent this access key invocation to other elements.

summary.span: 當叫用對這個項目有意義的便捷鍵 (Access Key) 時，為其提供類別處理。

span.span: Provides class handling for when an access key that is meaningful for this element is invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在任何實際 AccessKey 事件類別，或其他位置，您可以引發或附加的處理常式。There is no actual AccessKey event in the class, or elsewhere, which you can raise or attach handlers for. 相反地，透過專用的管理員類別，產生事件，其中進行後置處理所有輸入来搜尋適用於整個輸入模型的存取金鑰。Instead, the event is originated via a dedicated manager class, , which post-processes all input to search for access keys that are applicable to the entire input model.

para.span: 這個方法中的預設實作設定鍵盤焦點移到這個項目 (藉由呼叫)。

span.span: The default implementation of this method in sets keyboard focus to this element (by calling ).

para.span: 如果它們是可設定焦點，因為它是協助工具案例中的預期的行為的實作應該延續此行為。

span.span: Implementations should perpetuate this behavior if they are focusable, because it is an expected behavior for accessibility scenarios.

para.span: 請注意，基底實作不做任何動作與傳遞的事件資料，而且會引發任何進一步的事件。它只會將焦點。

span.span: Note that the base implementation does nothing with the passed event data and raises no further event; it just sets the focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChildDesiredSizeChanged(class System.Windows.UIElement child) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnChildDesiredSizeChanged (child As UIElement)

param.name: child
param.span: 正在調整大小的子項目。

span.span: The child element that is being resized.

summary.span: 會在調整子項目的大小時支援配置行為。

span.span: Supports layout behavior when a child element is resized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您的應用程式程式碼通常不呼叫這個方法。This method is typically not called by your application code. 它會公開讓衍生的類別可以進行進一步的項目會檢查其本身可能是無效的配置狀態。It is exposed so that derived element classes can make further checks on their own possibly invalid layout state. 類別也可嘗試最佳化，以將配置傳遞至子元素的大小變更為基礎的處理時間降到最低。Classes could also attempt optimizations to minimize the processing time for a layout pass based on size changes to child elements. 範例衍生項目類別可實作是控制項。An example derived element class that implements is the control.

para.span: 方法具有呼叫的預設實作本身。

span.span: The method has the default implementation of calling on itself.

para.span: 一般的實作： 請勿任何最佳化您自己的項目支援，以及然後通常會呼叫基底至少其中一個程式碼分支 （表示 「 有所變更 」 狀態，每個快取邏輯您自己的量值的一個）。

span.span: A typical implementation would be: do whatever optimization your own element supports, and then typically call base from at least one of the code branches (the one that indicated "dirty" state per your own measure caching logic).

para.span: 版面配置處理中如果它的子系本身發出大小變更，只會呼叫這個方法。

span.span: This method is only called in the layout processing if it was the child itself that originated the size changes.

para.span: 否則，如果父項目會起始傳遞，版面配置系統規則，根據父代重新計算配置已。

span.span: Otherwise, if the parent element initiates the pass, according to the layout system rules, the parent is recalculating layout already.

para.span: 版面配置系統順序處理配置子系的父系，因此需要從子項目配置呼叫沒有傳回父項目調整大小。

span.span: The layout system processes layout in the order of child-to-parent, so no return to parent element sizing from the child element layout calls is necessary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer OnCreateAutomationPeer() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function OnCreateAutomationPeer () As AutomationPeer

summary.span: 為 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構傳回類別特定的 實作。

span.span: Returns class-specific implementations for the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

returns.span: 因型別而異的 實作。

span.span: The type-specific implementation.

para.span: 這個方法的實作會在呼叫的特定建構函式通常是實作中，並將其傳回做為傳回值。

span.span: The implementation of this method is typically to call the constructor of a specific implementation, and return it as the return value.

para.span: 所有衍生的類別應該實作這個方法以提供它們自己的特定實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基礎結構。

span.span: All derived classes should implement this method in order to provide their own specific implementations to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

para.span: 如需實作此模式的詳細資訊，請參閱。

span.span: For details on implementing this pattern, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDragEnter(class System.Windows.DragEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDragEnter (e As DragEventArgs)

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

Protected Overridable Sub OnDragLeave (e As DragEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。The implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此虛擬方法，就會引發時的值相依性屬性變更。This virtual method is raised when the value of the dependency property changes. 虛擬方法會先引發，並可以操作需要的事件資料。The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 然後在與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 請注意，事件就不會路由的事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此虛擬方法，就會引發時的值相依性屬性變更其值。This virtual method is raised when the value of the dependency property changes its value. 虛擬方法會先引發，並可以操作需要的事件資料。The virtual method is raised first and can manipulate the event data as necessary. 然後在與該相同的事件資料執行個體就會引發事件。Then the event is raised with that same event data instance. 請注意，事件就不會路由的事件。Notice that the event is not a routed event. 因此，您無法將它標示為已處理的類別處理常式中。Therefore, you cannot mark it as handled in the class handler. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鍵動作是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Keystrokes are handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴按鍵，例如，輸入和命令繫結的其他程式設計功能可能會處理按鍵之前它會公開為一般的按鍵。Other programming features that rely on keystrokes, for example, input and command bindings, might handle the keystroke before it is exposed as a general keystroke. 如果這些輸入系統功能將事件標記為已處理，然後不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, then is not invoked. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

summary.span: 使用所提供的事件資料引發 路由事件。

span.span: Raises the routed event by using the event data that is provided.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法中，雖然是虛擬的沒有預設實作會引發事件。This method, although virtual, does have a default implementation that raises the event. 這在 \* 方法實作用來引發事件，這個相同的方法實作會在內部叫用來引發事件時屬性值變更。This On\* method implementation is intended to raise the event, and this same method implementation is invoked internally to raise the event when the property value changes. 這項實作不同於其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]上 \* 只提供便利的方式來加入類別處理事件的實作。This implementation differs from some other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] On\* implementations, which only provide a convenient way to add class handling for that event.

para.span: 除非您有故意和不尋常的需要，將不會引發焦點事件，請確定您的實作呼叫基底實作。

span.span: Unless you have a deliberate and unusual need to not raise the focus events, make sure that your implementation calls the base implementation.

para.span: 否則，通常將焦點設定至這個項目的一般使用者作業期間將不會引發事件。

span.span: Otherwise, the event is not raised during typical user operations that ordinarily set focus to this element.

para.span: 如果您不想要您可設定焦點的項目，您可以防止項目可設定焦點設定至。

span.span: If you do not intend your element to be focusable, you can prevent the element from being focusable by setting to .

param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 此事件資料會報告有關按下的滑鼠按鈕以及已處理狀態的詳細資訊。

span.span: This event data reports details about the mouse button that was pressed and the handled state.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled attached event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是具有直接路由策略的路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體的處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是具有直接路由策略的路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event, with a direct routing strategy. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體的處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing the typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件反昇路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a bubbling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為路由傳送，泡泡圖的基礎事件和每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is bubble routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnMouseWheel(class System.Windows.Input.MouseWheelEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnMouseWheel (e As MouseWheelEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收的項目上引發時收到。Either of these events may be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理負責執行下的所有可能的滑鼠按鈕。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button down actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

span.span: The that contains the event data.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫在您衍生的類別，而不需要呼叫基底實作; 不過，這會覆寫停用事件。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling the base implementation; however, this override disables the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPreviewMouseRightButtonDown(class System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPreviewMouseRightButtonDown (e As MouseButtonEventArgs)

param.name: e

span.span: The that contains the event data.

param.span: 事件資料會報告滑鼠右鍵已按下。

span.span: The event data reports that the right mouse button was pressed.

summary.span: 當未處理的 路由事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when an unhandled routed event reaches an element in its route that is derived from this class.

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件傳輸通道的路由會出現但實際上是以間接方式。The event appears to travel a tunneling route but actually travels in an indirect way. 為基礎的事件通道路由傳送，且每個沿著事件路由會使用相同的處理來直接路由的事件的引發。 is the underlying event that is tunnel routed, and each along the event route uses identical handling to raise the direct routed event . 雖然您可以將標記為基於的這個項目已處理的事件，處理的狀態不保存事件路由上的其他項目。Although you can mark the event as handled for purposes of this element, the handled state does not perpetuate to other elements along the event route. 不過，您可能想要將事件標記為已處理，以避免一般的執行個體處理常式 (即未指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。However, you might want to mark the event as handled in order to prevent general instance handlers (those that did not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked. 一般的滑鼠事件處理中的預設實作接聽並將它轉換成適當的本機事件。The default implementation for general mouse event handling in listens for and converts it to an appropriate local event. 如果您想要覆寫這個邏輯，您必須建立衍生的類別。If you want to override this logic, you must create a derived class. 在衍生類別的靜態建構函式中註冊替代的類別處理常式。In the static constructor of your derived class, register an alternative class handler for . 您無法變更處理行為的滑鼠藉由覆寫。You cannot change the mouse handling behavior of by overriding . 或者，您可以覆寫這個方法以變更處理特定的滑鼠狀態的事件。Alternatively, you can override this method in order to change event handling for a specific mouse state. 您是否願意呼叫基底實作，取決於您的案例。Whether you choose to call the base implementation depends on your scenario. 無法呼叫基底會停用該也預期會叫用的上階類別上的滑鼠事件的預設輸入的處理。Failing to call base disables default input handling for that mouse event on ancestor classes that also expect to invoke . 例如，您可以從衍生並覆寫中您的衍生類別，而不呼叫基底; 不過，此覆寫停用內容功能表上的服務您的控制項，也就是組件的預設行為。For example, you can derive from and override in your derived class without calling base; however, this override disables the context menu services on your control, which are part of the default behavior.

summary.span: 當未處理的 附加事件到達其路由中衍生自此類別的項目時叫用。

summary.span: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 滑鼠按鈕動作也是由專用的輸入管理員處理。Mouse button actions are also handled by a dedicated input manager. 依賴滑鼠按鈕的動作，例如輸入和命令繫結之前它會公開為一般的滑鼠按鈕動作, 可能會叫用動作的處理常式的其他程式設計功能。Other programming features that rely on mouse button actions, such as input and command bindings, might invoke handlers for the action before it is exposed as a general mouse button action. 如果這些輸入系統功能標記事件為已處理，不會叫用。If these input system features mark the event as handled, is not invoked. 如果您使用這個類別處理常式來標示為已處理的事件時，可能會影響下列事件：和。If you use this class handler to mark the event as handled, you potentially impact the following events: and . 其中一個這些事件可能會接收項目上引發時收到。Either of these events might be raised on the receiving element when is received. 如果您要標示為已處理的類別中處理此事件，仍然會引發子;不過，它們將傳遞事件資料中處理的狀態。If you mark this event as handled in class handling, subevents are still raised; however, they pass the handled state in the event data. 如果在處理中的類別處理事件，副的執行個體處理常式不會叫用除非您明確地使用與`handledEventsToo``true`才能附加處理常式。If the event is handled in class handling, instance handlers for the subevents are not invoked unless you explicitly use with `handledEventsToo` `true` in order to attach handlers. 類別處理常式也不會叫用這些類別處理常式已向除非簽章與`handledEventsToo` `true`。Class handlers also are not invoked unless those class handlers were registered with the signature with `handledEventsToo` `true`. 藉由處理，您會隱含的類別處理計算在內的所有可能滑鼠動作。By handling , you are implying that your class handling accounted for all possible mouse button up actions. 這種行為可能不想;當您使用此虛擬方法標記為已處理的事件，因此，使用警告。This behavior might be unwanted; Therefore, use caution when you use this virtual method to mark events as handled. 每個按鈕特定直接事件也有虛擬機器 \* 方法。請考慮是否覆寫這些按鈕特定的類別處理常式可能更合適。Each of the button-specific direct events also has a virtual On\* method; consider whether overriding these button-specific class handlers might be more appropriate. 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

Protected Overridable Sub OnPreviewStylusDown (e As StylusDownEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled. 是特別針對預覽事件的另一種情形是將它們加以處理，因此相符的反昇類別處理常式不會叫用標記。Another scenario that is specifically for Preview events is to mark them handled so that the matching bubbling class handlers are not invoked.

param.name: drawingContext

span.span: The drawing instructions for a specific element.

param.span: 此內容會提供給配置系統。

span.span: This context is provided to the layout system.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，參與由配置系統導向的呈現作業。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 這個項目的呈現指令不會在叫用此方法時直接使用，而是會加以保留，以便稍後由配置和繪圖做非同步使用。

span.span: The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法有預設的實作類別。This method has no default implementation in the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範可能的面板衍生類別實作。The following code example shows a possible implementation for a panel derived class. [!code-csharp[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/CSharp/OffsetPanel.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LightWeightCustomPanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LightWeightCustomPanel/visualbasic/offsetpanel.vb#1)]

para.span: 可以覆寫方法新增其他圖形 （先前未定義於邏輯樹狀結構） 的項目呈現的項目，例如效果或裝飾項。

span.span: The method can be overridden to add further graphical elements (not previously defined in a logical tree) to a rendered element, such as effects or adorners.

para.span: A物件會傳遞做為引數，提供方法來繪製圖形、 文字、 影像或視訊。

span.span: A object is passed as an argument, which provides methods for drawing shapes, text, images or videos.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnRenderSizeChanged (System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo info);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnRenderSizeChanged(class System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo info) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnRenderSizeChanged (info As SizeChangedInfo)

param.name: info
param.span: 封裝的參數 ()，其包含舊大小和新大小，且維度 (Dimension) 實際上有變更。

span.span: The packaged parameters (), which includes old and new sizes, and which dimension actually changes.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，參與由配置系統導向的呈現作業。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system.

summary.span: 如果項目的 已由於配置更新而變更，則會在配置更新之後且在呈現之前叫用這個方法。

span.span: This method is invoked after layout update, and before rendering, if the element's has changed as a result of layout update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 一般的 WPF 架構層級項目會使用從覆寫實作。A typical WPF framework-level element uses the override implementation from . 實作失效和屬性，並處理改造版面配置的基本概念。The implementation invalidates the and properties and handles the basics of remaking the layout. 覆寫在層級意味著，項目實作如果故意不使用的 WPF 架構層級實作，因此您的項目必須處理的配置邏輯更直接，通常透過撰寫取代版面配置系統。Overriding at the level implies that your element implementation is deliberately not using the WPF framework-level implementation, and therefore your element must handle layout logic more directly, typically by writing a replacement layout system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 由於路由的事件就會引發子元素，不一定會叫用處理常式的項目，On \* 方法的實作模式是不同的路由事件。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because a routed event can be raised by a child element, which is not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers. 因此，您的實作必須檢查的事件資料來源屬性。Therefore, your implementation needs to examine the source properties of the event data. 它不應嘗試重新引發此事件在大部分情況下。It should not try to reraise the event in most cases. 覆寫這個方法，或登錄類別處理常式取代，衍生的類別事件路由上收到事件時，可以呼叫私用類別處理常式方法。Either by overriding this method or by registering class handlers with , derived classes of can call private class handler methods when the event is received along the event route. 其中類別處理是適當的其中一個案例是操作事件資料，並標示為已處理的路由的事件。One scenario where class handling is appropriate is to manipulate the event data and mark the routed event as handled.

Protected Overridable Sub OnStylusInRange (e As StylusEventArgs)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會具有預設的實作。This method has no default implementation. 因為中繼類別繼承中的可能會實作這個方法，我們建議您在自己的實作呼叫基底實作。Because an intermediate class in the inheritance might implement this method, we recommend that you call the base implementation in your implementation. 您可能會呼叫基底之前或之後特殊處理，根據您的需求。You may call base either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements. 這個方法的目的是類似於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件模式 \* 方法： 這個方法會提供要藉由建立類別處理常式，而不是執行個體處理常式處理衍生類別的比對事件的方法。The purpose of this method is similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: this method provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes by establishing a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在此情況下，符合的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. 將事件標示為已處理仍很有用防止一般的執行個體處理常式 (這些不指定`handledEventsToo`) 叫用。Marking the event as handled is still useful for preventing typical instance handlers (those that do not specify `handledEventsToo`) from being invoked.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnVisualParentChanged (System.Windows.DependencyObject oldParent);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnVisualParentChanged(class System.Windows.DependencyObject oldParent) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnVisualParentChanged (oldParent As DependencyObject)

param.name: oldParent

span.span: The previous parent.

param.span: 如果 先前沒有父項目，這可提供為 。

span.span: This may be provided as if the did not have a parent element previously.

summary.span: 當這個 的父項目報告其基礎視覺化父項目的變更時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when the parent element of this reports a change to its underlying visual parent.
