MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定不透明度因素，當該因素在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 中呈現時會套用至整個 。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity factor applied to the entire when it is rendered in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 不透明度因素。

span.span: The opacity factor.

value.span: 預設不透明度為 1.0。

span.span: Default opacity is 1.0.

value.span: 值必須介於 0.0 到 1.0 之間。

span.span: Expected values are between 0.0 and 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 1.0 的預設值是提供初始的中繼資料，在此相依性屬性的預設值類別。The 1.0 default value is the default provided by the initial metadata of this dependency property on the class. 其他衍生的類別可能可以藉由覆寫其類別建構函式內的中繼資料變更此預設值。Other derived classes may potentially change this default value by overriding the metadata from within their class constructor. 值除非項目也會顯示將不會套用至實際的配置 (是`true`)。The value of won't be applied to actual layout unless the element is also visible ( is `true`). 會套用至從父項目向下項目樹狀結構子項目，但巢狀的不透明度設定不以個別的子元素的屬性值的顯示效果。 is applied from parent elements on down the element tree to child elements, but the visible effects of the nested opacity settings aren't indicated in the property value of individual child elements. 比方說，如果清單有 50%(0.5) 的不透明度，其中一個清單項目有自己設定為 20%(0.2) 的不透明度，net 可見的不透明度，清單項目將會轉譯好像 10%(0.1)，但清單項目的屬性值屬性仍將是 0.2 時，會查詢。For instance, if a list has a 50% (0.5) opacity and one of its list items has its own opacity set to 20% (0.2), the net visible opacity for that list item will be rendered as if it were 10% (0.1), but the property value of the list item property would still be 0.2 when queried. 即使宣告或評估的不透明度為 0，項目仍參與輸入的事件和命令，並可能可設定焦點。Even if the declared or evaluated opacity is 0, an element still participates in input events and commands, and is potentially focusable. 這方面很有用，例如用於不透明度零之類的物件 （圖形） 遮罩具有透明項目的基礎物件。This aspect can be useful, for instance you can use an opacity-zero object (such as a shape) for masking underlying objects with transparent elements. 不透明度為零的物件，然後可處理所有輸入的事件處理為基礎的區域。The opacity-zero object can then handle all the input event processing for an underlying area. 不過，`Background`或`Fill`物件或圖形的應設為值，即使它是，否則不啟用點擊測試，並不接收任何事件。However, the `Background` or `Fill` of the object or shape should be set to a value, even if it is , otherwise hit testing is not enabled, and no events are received. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定不透明遮罩做為 實作，該實作會套用至這個項目之呈現內容的任何 Alpha 色頻 (Alpha Channel) 遮罩。

span.span: Gets or sets an opacity mask, as a implementation that is applied to any alpha-channel masking for the rendered content of this element.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 用於不透明度遮罩的筆刷。

span.span: The brush to use for opacity masking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會使用 alpha 色板值會提供任何。This property only uses whatever the alpha channel value is for the supplied . 其他頻道的的呈現的內容 （紅色、 綠色或藍色） 都會被忽略。The other channels of the 's rendered content (Red, Green, or Blue) are ignored. 最常見為此用途，可以使用各種不同的遮罩技術，例如插文的相片。The most typical for this purpose is an , which can be used for a variety of photo masking techniques such as a vignette. 但定義(例如) 可以使用。But any defined (such as ) can be used. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，這個屬性值可以使用內嵌語法所特有的每個實作抽象類別。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], this property value can use an inline syntax that is specific to each implementation of the abstract class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用單色和漸層概觀繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列標記範例所示套用至另一個的不透明度遮罩。The following markup example shows an opacity mask applied to another . [!code-xaml[OpacityMasksSnippet#UIElementOpacityMask](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpacityMasksSnippet/CS/ImageBrushExample.xaml#uielementopacitymask)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值可唯一識別此項目。

span.span: Gets a value that uniquely identifies this element.

value.span: 這個項目的唯一識別項。

span.span: The unique identifier for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可唯一識別每個項目。 uniquely identifies each element. 項目會保存相同每次相同[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入 （包括二進位表示法）。An element keeps the same every time the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is loaded (including binary representations). 這個識別碼用於內部載入、 剖析和序列化需求。This identifier is used for internal loading, parsing and serialization requirements. 它不是可供您的應用程式程式碼。It is not intended to be used by your application code. 此屬性沒有任何關聯性任何給定的執行個體的結果。This property has no relationship to the result for any given instance.

span.span: The direction of the requested focus traversal.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回會針對指定之焦點周遊方向接收焦點的項目，而不用實際將焦點移至該項目。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the element that would receive focus for a specified focus traversal direction, without actually moving focus to that element.

returns.span: 如果實際上有叫用 ，就會取得焦點的項目。

span.span: The element that would have received focus if were actually invoked.

summary.span: 輸入系統報告其下以此項目作為拖曳目標的拖曳事件時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 焦點在這個項目上方且按下按鍵時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a key is pressed while focus is on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引鍵處理互動與其他的平台功能，例如命令和撰寫文字。Key handling interacts with other platform features such as commanding and text composition. 是可能無法如預期般特定控制項的較低層級文字輸入的事件。The event is a lower-level text input event that might not behave as expected on certain controls. 這是因為有些控制項會有複合控制項，或提供文字的高階版本的類別處理輸入處理和相關事件。This is because some controls have control compositing or class handling that provides a higher-level version of text input handling and related events. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewKeyDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewKeyDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 鍵盤不再以此元素為焦點時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the keyboard is no longer focused on this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件使用通道路由，因為失去焦點的項目可能是子元素，而非項目實際附加事件處理常式。Because this event uses tunneling routing, the element that lost focus might be a child element instead of the element where the event handler is actually attached. 請檢查事件資料來判斷實際失去焦點的項目中。Check the in the event data to determine the actual element that lost focus. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 指標在此元素上方且按下任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown As MouseButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且按下滑鼠左按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這看起來要遵循的通道路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseLeftButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

span.span: Occurs when the right mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然這看起來要遵循的通道路由處理項目樹狀結構，但實際上是直接的路由的事件引發且由每個項目樹狀結構沿著 reraised 。Although this seems to follow a tunneling route through an element tree, it actually is a direct routed event that is raised and reraised along the element tree by each . 此事件會報告滑鼠按鈕細節的基礎的多個相關事件的其中一個事件，這是附加的事件處理的事件路由上的每個項目。This event is one of several related events that report the mouse-button specifics of an underlying event, which is an attached event that is processed by each element along an event route. 這個事件的事件資料會公開事件資料的基礎事件。The event data of this event exposes the event data of the underlying event. 如果該事件標示為已處理此事件路由上，仍然會引發滑鼠按鈕的特定事件。不過，必須加入的滑鼠按鈕的特定事件的處理常式藉由明確地呼叫，選項來處理已標記為已處理的事件、 事件接聽程式，才能使用。If that event is marked as handled along the event route, the mouse-button specific events are still raised; however, handlers of the mouse-button specific events must be added by explicitly calling , with the option to handle events that are already marked as handled, in order to be listeners to the event. 如果您將標示處理，您要基本上標記路由中的所有其他接聽程式處理，而且所有相關事件。If you mark handled, you are essentially marking handled for all further listeners along the route, and on all related events. 這可能是包含類別處理常式產生事件如。This possibly includes class-handler generated events such as . 在概念上，將這個事件 (和其他滑鼠按鈕的事件上) 是滑鼠 「 服務 」 (所提供的服務定義類別)。Conceptually, think of this event (and other mouse-button events on ) to be a mouse "service" (with the service definition provided by the class). 這個事件加入不需檢查原始的滑鼠事件的事件資料中的滑鼠按鈕狀態 （左右，上下按鈕控制項） 的便利性。The event adds the convenience of not needing to check the mouse button states (left-right, up-down) of the original mouse events in the event data. 更進階的情況下，例如檢查狀態的非標準按鈕，您可能需要使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]上類別而不是那些在。For more advanced scenarios, such as checking for states of non-standard buttons, you might need to use the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)] on the class rather than those on . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.RoutedEvent PreviewMouseRightButtonDownEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviewMouseRightButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且放開任何滑鼠按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when any mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 通常就會引發事件一起可能或，這對應到其中的兩個標準滑鼠按鈕的按下。The event is often raised together with either or , which correspond to a press of one of the two standard mouse buttons. 和也是路由的事件，但它們是直接路由的事件，就會引發適當的按鈕特定事件時事件到達事件路由上的這個項目。 and are also routed events, but they are direct routed events, and the appropriate button-specific event is raised when the event reaches this element along the event route. 請參閱備註或。See Remarks for or . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 滑鼠指標在此元素上方且使用者滾動滑鼠滾輪時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user rotates the mouse wheel while the mouse pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 焦點或滑鼠捕捉優先於滑鼠指標所在位置。因此，如果您收到這個事件與已取得焦點或擷取的項目時，滑鼠指標實際上可能是透過另一個項目。Focus or mouse capture take precedence over where the mouse pointer is; therefore, if you receive this event from a focused or captured element, the mouse pointer might actually be over another element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式; 但也可以產生語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of ; but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also generate . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events may raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 手指在這個項目上方且在螢幕上觸控時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a finger touches the screen while the finger is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|通道Tunneling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應的反昇事件。The corresponding bubbling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 要求顯示游標時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the cursor is requested to display.

summary.span: 每當滑鼠指標移動至新位置時，都會引發此事件，這意謂游標物件可能會根據其新位置而變更。

span.span: This event is raised on an element each time that the mouse pointer moves to a new location, which means the cursor object might need to be changed based on its new position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 這個事件名稱所參考的資料指標不一定是文字游標 （有時稱為插入點）。The cursor being referred to by this event name is not necessarily the text cursor (sometimes known as the insertion point). 相反地，此內容中的資料指標是宣告畫面的圖形化顯示數個可能的輸入相關裝置或在 Windows 程式設計概念相關的物件。Instead, the cursor in this context is the object that declares the onscreen graphical display related to several possible input-related devices or concepts in Windows programming. 該物件由WPF 中的類別。That object is represented by the class in WPF. WPF 輸入的系統可讓您變更這個資料指標，它代表在螢幕上的滑鼠指標位置時。The WPF input system enables you to change this cursor when it represents the onscreen position of the mouse pointer. 您可以使用預先定義的值從列舉型別，或者您可以宣告為影像檔的自訂資料指標。You can use predefined values from the enumeration, or you can declare a custom cursor as an image file. 接聽事件就不會針對資料指標管理而有效率的技術。Listening for the event is not an efficient technique for cursor management. 相反地，每個項目應該定義自己的資料指標行為和。Instead, each element should define its own cursor behavior with and . 您只應依賴如果您不想要使用的 WPF 架構層級基底項目，或在異常的情況下，其中定義以每個項目為基礎的資料指標的行為不符合您的需求。You should only rely on if you are not using the WPF framework-level base elements, or in extraordinary circumstances where defining cursor behavior on a per-element basis does not meet your needs. 如需有關在回應中實作資料指標行為，請參閱。For more information on implementing cursor behavior in response to , see . ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 沒有定義對應通道的事件。There is no defined corresponding tunneling event. - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 識別 路由事件。

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `e`參數的型別做為路由的事件的所有資料的通用基底類型; 不過，應該指定事件資料為最特定的事件資料類型是適用於所引發的事件，因為衍生的類別包含實際的特定資料是針對特定事件時引發此事件的屬性。The `e` parameter is typed as the common base type for all routed event data; however, the event data should be given as the most specific event data type that is available for the event being raised, because derived classes contain the actual specific data properties that are intended for the specific event when it is raised. 沒有狀態內容事件。它也會識別要引發哪個路由的事件。 is not just the state properties for the event; it also identifies which routed event to raise. 此事件引發模式且同時與不同的路由的事件資料[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件和資料類別，通常只包含與事件相關的屬性。This event-raising pattern and the routed event data both differ from [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] events and data classes, which typically just contain properties that are related to the event. ## Examples 下列範例會建立事件資料、 將事件的識別項附加至資料，，然後使用 以引發自訂的路由的事件的 事件資料執行個體。The following example creates event data, appends the event identifier to the data, and then uses the event data instance to raise a custom routed event. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#raiseevent)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#RaiseEvent](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#raiseevent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的案例使用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]是當您實作[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]自訂路由事件，特別是當您實作在處理常式的 「 移除 」 邏輯時相關聯的 「 包裝函式 」 事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]層級。The most common scenario for using this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] is when you implement the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] "wrapper" event that is associated with a custom routed event, specifically when you implement the "remove" logic for handlers at the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] level. 這會遵循範例 < 備註 > 一節會說明這種情況。The example that follows this remarks section illustrates this scenario. 如果沒有任何處理常式註冊以比對方法呼叫的輸入的參數的準則，則呼叫這個方法任何作用。Calling this method has no effect if there were no handlers registered with criteria that matches the input parameters for the method call. 如果一個以上的處理常式附加事件處理常式存放區會移除比對準則，第一個處理常式。If more than one handler is attached that matched the criteria, only the first handler in the event handler store is removed. 這個行為會與一致[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]行為`-=`運算子。This behavior is consistent with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] behavior of the `-=` operator. 既不`routedEvent`也`handler`可能`null`。Neither `routedEvent` nor `handler` may be `null`. 嘗試在提供做為任一個值`null`會引發例外狀況。Attempting to provide either value as `null` will raise an exception. 這個方法會忽略`handledEventsToo`加上參數資訊，如果第一個處理常式提供簽章，可讓已處理事件的處理。This method ignores the `handledEventsToo` parameter information, which is provided if the handler was first added with the signature that enables handling of already-handled events. 會移除任一類型的處理常式。Either type of handler is removed. ## Examples 下列範例會使用做為事件的包裝函式定義的一部分。The following example uses as part of an event wrapper definition. [!code-csharp[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/CSharp/SDKSampleLibrary/class1.cs#addremovehandler)] [!code-vb[RoutedEventCustom#AddRemoveHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RoutedEventCustom/VB/SDKSampleLibrary/Class1.vb#addremovehandler)]

summary.span: 取得 (或設定) 這個項目的最終呈現大小。

span.span: Gets (or sets) the final render size of this element.

value.span: 這個項目的呈現大小。

span.span: The rendered size for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 請勿嘗試設定此屬性有兩種[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]或程式碼，如果使用 WPF 架構層級配置系統中。Do not attempt to set this property, either in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] or in code, if using the WPF framework-level layout system. 幾乎所有的一般應用程式案例將會使用這個版面配置系統。Nearly all typical application scenarios will use this layout system. 版面配置系統將不會使用在中設定的大小直接屬性。The layout system will not respect sizes set in the property directly. 屬性宣告只用於讓特定 WPF 核心層級橋接刻意規避的一般版面配置通訊協定，例如支援的情況下可寫入類別。The property is declared writable only to enable certain WPF core-level bridging cases that deliberately circumvent the typical layout protocols, such as support for the class. 這個屬性可以用來檢查版面配置系統中的適用呈現大小會覆寫這類或。This property can be used for checking the applicable render size within layout system overrides such as or . 更常見的案例處理事件的類別處理常式覆寫或事件。A more common scenario is handling the event with the class handler override or the event. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用自訂的裝飾項值，以便建立及調整大小的矩形圖形，定義一部分的裝飾項，其實作。The following example shows how a custom adorner uses the value in order to create and size the rectangle graphic that defines the adorner, as part of its implementation. [!code-csharp[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#uielementdesiredsize)] [!code-vb[AdornersMiscCode#UIElementDesiredSize](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/AdornersMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#uielementdesiredsize)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ RenderTransform { System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Transform ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定影響這個項目呈現位置的轉換資訊。

span.span: Gets or sets transform information that affects the rendering position of this element.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 描述所需呈現轉換的特性。

span.span: Describes the specifics of the desired render transform.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈現轉換不會重新產生配置大小或呈現大小資訊。A render transform does not regenerate layout size or render size information. 呈現轉換通常用動畫顯示或元素套用暫時效果。Render transforms are typically intended for animating or applying a temporary effect to an element. 已取得焦點或將指標放上方，或可能會在載入該部分以吸引抖動時，此項目，例如可能縮放[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。For example, the element might zoom when focused or moused over, or might jitter on load to draw the eye to that part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得或設定任何可能由 宣告之呈現轉換、相對於項目範圍的中心點。

span.span: Gets or sets the center point of any possible render transform declared by , relative to the bounds of the element.

summary.span: 這是相依性屬性。

span.span: This is a dependency property.

value.span: 宣告呈現轉換的值。

span.span: The value that declares the render transform.

value.span: 預設值為具有座標 (0,0) 的 。

span.span: The default value is a with coordinates (0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多少非標準方式使用結構中的值不代表絕對位置座標系統中的。 has a somewhat nonstandard use of the structure value, in that the does not represent an absolute location in a coordinate system. 相反地，介於 0 和 1 之間的值會解譯為目前的項目中每個 x，y 軸的範圍內的因素。Instead, values between 0 and 1 are interpreted as a factor for the range of the current element in each x,y axis. 例如，(0.5，0.5) 會造成呈現轉換的元素上置中 (1，1) 會將呈現轉換底端右下角的項目。For example, (0.5,0.5) will cause the render transform to be centered on the element, or (1,1) would place the render transform at the bottom right corner of the element. 不接受的值。 is not an accepted value. 0 和 1 以外的值也會接受的並會導致更多的非傳統的轉換效果。Values beyond 0 and 1 are also accepted, and will result in more unconventional transform effects. 比方說，如果您設定(5,5)，並接著套用，項目本身的範圍之外，也會旋轉點。For instance, if you set to be (5,5), and then apply a , the rotation point will be well outside the bounds of the element itself. 轉換將會微調您的項目是圓形中有大源自右下角之外。The transform will spin your element around in a big circle that originates beyond bottom right. 來源可能會在其父項目內的某處，並可能超出框架或檢視表。The origin might be somewhere inside its parent element and could possibly be possibly out of frame or view. 負數的點值都是類似，會產生超出左上方的界限。Negative point values are similar, these will go beyond the top left bounds. 呈現轉換不會影響配置，以及通常用來建立動畫，或將暫存效果套用至項目。Render transforms do not affect layout, and are typically used to animate or apply a temporary effect to an element. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將此屬性設定為`true`在您的根項目，若要啟用像素貼齊呈現整個 UI。You can set this property to `true` on your root element to enable pixel snap rendering throughout the UI. 適用於裝置超過 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)]，像素貼齊呈現可以減少單一單元實線來消除鋸齒視覺成品。For devices operating at greater than 96 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dpi](~/includes/tlasharptla-dpi-md.md)], pixel snap rendering can minimize anti-aliasing visual artifacts in the vicinity of single-unit solid lines. 當繼承或任何可能在衍生類別，設定此相依性屬性的中繼資料會覆寫中繼資料屬性來`true`。When inherited by or any possible derived classes, overrides the metadata for this dependency property to set the metadata property to `true`. 這可達到是只將最外層項目樹狀子目錄中的必須指定為`true`，然後將會報告該子樹狀結構的所有子項目為`true`，而且必須視覺效果。What this achieves is that only the outermost element in a subtree needs to specify as `true`, and all child elements of that subtree will then report as `true` and will have the visual effect. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly SnapsToDevicePixelsProperty As DependencyProperty

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StylusButtonDown As StylusButtonEventHandler

summary.span: 手寫筆指標在此元素上方且按下手寫筆按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus button is pressed while the pointer is over this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

Public Shared ReadOnly StylusButtonDownEvent As RoutedEvent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註冊路由事件時，會建立路由事件識別項。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 這些識別項包含用於加入事件擁有者的識別名稱、擁有者類型、處理常式類型、路由策略和公用程式方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 您可以使用這些識別項來加入類別處理常式。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 如需註冊路由事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 如需使用路由事件識別項來加入類別處理常式的詳細資訊，請參閱 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

summary.span: 手寫筆進入此元素的邊界時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the stylus enters the bounds of this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是，使用直接的事件處理路由策略。 is a that uses the direct event handling routing strategy. 直接路由的事件不會引發的路由。相反地，它們會在處理相同的項目所引發的位置。Direct routed events are not raised along a route; instead, they are handled in the same element where they are raised. 不過，它們會啟用路由的事件的行為，例如事件觸發程序在樣式中的其他層面。However, they do enable other aspects of routed event behavior, such as event triggers in styles. 雖然當手寫筆進入範圍的項目，這個多個事件的追蹤依其字面報告屬性值已經從`false`至`true`這個項目上。Although tracks when the stylus enters the bounds of an element, this event more literally reports that the property value has changed from `false` to `true` on this element. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. 觸控、 滑鼠及手寫筆輸入存在於特定的關聯性。Touch, mouse, and stylus input exist in a particular relationship. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 舉例來說，會填入這個集合的控制項是。An example of a control that populates this collection is . 新增做為集合項目，這可讓互動手寫筆輸入，並產生唯一的呈現方式，以回應手寫筆驅動事件。 adds the as a collection item, which enables the to interact with stylus input and produce the unique rendering in response to stylus driven events. 如需有關建立自訂外掛程式可以接收和解譯手寫筆輸入，請參閱[輸入將手寫筆攔截](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md)。For information on creating custom plug-ins that can receive and interpret stylus input, see [Intercepting Input from the Stylus](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/intercepting-input-from-the-stylus.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立執行個體，並將它加入至處理控制項的自訂筆墨的集合。The following example creates a instance and adds it to the collection for a custom ink handling control. summary.span: 此元素以一種與裝置無關的方式取得文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when this element gets text in a device-independent manner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件可能已標示為處理複合控制項的內部實作。This event might already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 請參閱下方的 「 備註。See Remark below. 事件可能已標示為已處理的複合控制項的內部實作。The event may already be marked as handled by the internal implementations of composited controls. 例如，是複合控制項其中事件已標示為處理; 在其複合 （compositing）。For example, a is a composited control where the event is already marked as handled; within its compositing. 控制項執行這項操作，因為控制項必須解譯某些類型的輸入，例如方向鍵，該控制項的特別意義。Controls do this because the control needs to interpret some types of input, such as arrow keys, as having special meaning to that control. 如果您使用您用來附加文字輸入的處理常式的事件，您可能會收到更好的結果。If you use as the event where you attach handlers for text input, you may receive better results. 這項技術規避大部分的情況下，其中已將這個事件標記為已處理控制項撰寫，而防止接收事件路由上的事件處理常式。This technique circumvents most cases where control composition has already marked this event as handled and prevents your handler from receiving the event along the event route. 事件可讓元件或應用程式與裝置無關的方式接聽文字輸入。The event allows a component or application to listen for text input in a device-independent manner. 鍵盤是的主要方式，但也可以引發語音、 手寫，以及其他輸入的裝置。The keyboard is the primary means of , but speech, handwriting, and other input devices can also raise . 因為組合 — 在預設鍵盤或輸入的法編輯器透過 — 多個按鍵事件可能會引發一個文字輸入的事件。Because of key combinations—either in default keyboards or through input method editors—multiple key events might raise just one text input event. 此事件會建立一個別名附加事件，這個類別，以便屬於類別的成員 清單時繼承基底的項目。This event creates an alias for the attached event for this class, so that is part of the class members list when is inherited as a base element. 事件處理常式附加至事件會附加至基礎附加事件和接收相同的事件資料執行個體。Event handlers that are attached to the event are attached to the underlying attached event and receive the same event data instance. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，和手指接觸到螢幕，並移動之前不會發生事件。By default, the and events do not occur until a finger touches the screen and moves. 手指在螢幕上按住不移動的方式會使按下並按住行為。Pressing a finger on the screen and holding it without moving it causes the press and hold behavior of a . 按住行為相當於按一下滑鼠右鍵。The press and hold behavior is equivalent to a mouse right-click. 若要讓和手指接觸到螢幕，因為發生事件設定附加屬性`false`這個項目的。To cause the and events to occur as soon as a finger touches the screen, set the attached property to `false` for this element. ## 路由事件資訊Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|反昇Bubbling| |Delegate - 委派Delegate|型別 的 。 of type .| - 對應通道的事件。The corresponding tunneling event is . - 覆寫實作在衍生類別中這個事件的類別處理。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Point TranslatePoint (System.Windows.Point point, System.Windows.UIElement relativeTo);
.method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point TranslatePoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point point, class System.Windows.UIElement relativeTo) cil managed
public: System::Windows::Point TranslatePoint(System::Windows::Point point, System::Windows::UIElement ^ relativeTo);

param.name: point
param.span: 相對於這個項目的點值。

span.span: The point value, as relative to this element.

param.name: relativeTo
param.span: 指定的點要轉換成的項目。

span.span: The element to translate the given point into.

summary.span: 將相對於這個項目的點轉換成相對於指定項目的座標。

span.span: Translates a point relative to this element to coordinates that are relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 點值，現在會相對於目標項目，而不是這個來源項目。

span.span: A point value, now relative to the target element rather than this source element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞`null`如`relativeTo`允許，並指出座標應該相對於這個項目所屬之邏輯樹狀結構中的根元素。Passing `null` for `relativeTo` is permitted, and indicates that coordinates should be relative to the root element in the logical tree that this element belongs to. 這個方法用來轉譯點擊測試點值。This method is used for translating hit test point values. 呼叫這個方法是主要相關，如果您正在撰寫的控制項，而且需要處理較低層級的輸入。Calling this method is mainly relevant if you are authoring a control and need to process input at a lower level. 如果您使用現有的控制項，您通常可以假設已完成的控制項將報表正確轉譯的點擊的測試結果。If you are using existing controls, you can generally assume that completed controls will report correctly translated hit test results.

summary.span: 確認這個項目的所有視覺化子項目都已正確為配置而更新。

span.span: Ensures that all visual child elements of this element are properly updated for layout.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫這個方法，具有項目`false`或`false`會呼叫項目專屬和方法，這會強制版面配置更新，且會驗證所有計算的大小。When you call this method, elements with `false` or `false` will call element-specific and methods, which forces layout update, and all computed sizes will be validated. 呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用，如果配置並未變更，或配置的排列方式都度量狀態無效。Calling this method has no effect if layout is unchanged, or if neither arrangement nor measurement state of a layout is invalid. 不過，如果配置不能用在任一一方面，呼叫將會取消整個版面配置。However, if layout is invalid in either respect, the call will redo the entire layout. 因此，您應該避免呼叫項目樹狀結構中的每個增量和次要變更後。Therefore, you should avoid calling after each incremental and minor change in the element tree. 延後的方式，使用的演算法來平衡效能與貨幣，並使用加權策略延遲根目錄的變更，直到所有的子元素都是有效的版面配置系統會執行項目配置。The layout system will perform element layout in a deferred manner, using an algorithm that balances performance and currency, and with a weighting strategy to defer changes to roots until all child elements are valid. 您應該只呼叫如果一定需要更新的大小和位置，並且只在您確認之後所有控制項，您可能會影響配置的屬性變更完成都之後。You should only call if you absolutely need updated sizes and positions, and only after you are certain that all changes to properties that you control and that may affect layout are completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會影響值，其接著可能會引發事件。Setting this property affects the value of , which in turn may raise the event. 不過，有其他因素影響，例如包含它的父代的可見性設定。However, has other factors that influence it, for instance the visibility settings of parents that contain it. 項目位置不不會參與輸入事件 （或命令）、 不會影響測量或排列傳遞的版面配置、 索引標籤順序及將不會報告在點擊測試。Elements where is not do not participate in input events (or commands), do not influence either the Measure or Arrange passes of layout, are not in a tab sequence, and will not be reported in hit testing. 當繼承或其衍生的類別，會重新定義預設值，這個屬性是。When inherited by or its derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be . 這是不執行上一開始建立的 版面配置的測量傳遞的效果，和傳回 (0，0)。This has the effect of not running the Measure pass of layout on an initially created , and returns (0,0). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 。For details, see . 也會重新定義預設值為，具有類似的結果行為，如和其衍生的類別。 also redefines the default value to be , with similar resulting behavior for and its derived classes. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會實作參考兩個不同的具名的按鈕要是互斥的配對，使用者介面中的處理常式。The following example implements a handler that references two different named buttons that are intended to be a mutually exclusive pair in the user interface. 按鈕本身設定為執行與按鈕相關聯的實際程式邏輯之前, ，而且配對中的其他按鈕設為。Prior to running the actual program logic associated with the button, the button itself is set to be , and the other button in the pair is set to . [!code-csharp[MediaElement_snip#UIElementVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaElement_snip/CSharp/PlaybackExample.cs#uielementvisibility)] [!code-vb[MediaElement_snip#UIElementVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MediaElement_snip/VB/PlaybackExample.vb#uielementvisibility)]
